DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_HeroTaunt: 装備しているヒーローの挑発を使用する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ShopToggle: ショップパネルを開く。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_PurchaseQuickbuy: クイックバイエリアにある先頭のアイテムを購入する。

DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatVoiceParty: マイクを使ってパーティーメンバーとコミュニケーションをとる。オープンマイクを設定している場合は、ダッシュボードでも使用できます。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatWheel: チャットホイールを使って、よく使うフレーズを伝える。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_HeroChatWheel: ヒーローチャットホイールを使って、自分のヒーローに特定のフレーズを喋らせる。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_CameraGrip: キーを押しながらドラッグすることで、カメラを操作する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ActivateGlyph: Glyph of Fortificationを使用して5秒間建造物を無敵にする。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ScoreboardToggle: スコアボードを表示する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Pause: 試合のポーズ、ポーズの解除を行う。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ScreenshotSettings: スクリーンショットを撮る。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Console: コンソールを開く。（上級者向け）
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_DeathSummary: デスサマリーを表示する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_DotaAlt: Altキー修飾子を設定する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_DotaAlternativeCast: Altキャストがあるアビリティの非選択時の効果を、トグルすることなくキャストするためのキーを設定する (デフォルトはCtrlキー)
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Group: 設定したユニットグループを選択する。グループの設定するには、対象ユニットを選択して、Ctrlキー＋グループのホットキーを押してください。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Legacy: Dota1のホットキーを使用します。アビリティーのホットキー設定はヒーローによって異なります。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_PerUnitHotkeys: ユニットによって異なるホットキーを使用する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Quickcast:
ホットキー押したときのマウスカーソルの位置にアビリティをキャストすることができます。

「高度なクイックキャスト/ホットキー」を有効にするとアビリティごとにキー設定できるようになります。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Quickcast_Items:
ホットキー押したときのマウスカーソルの位置にアイテムをキャストすることができます。

「高度なクイックキャスト/ホットキー」を有効にするとアビリティごとにキー設定できるようになります。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Autocast: アビリティーが準備できたとき、自動的にキャストするように切り替えます。適用できるアビリティは限られています。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_Cast: アビリティをキャストするためのホットキー。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_AbilityCast: アビリティを使用するためのホットキー。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ItemCast: インベントリ内のアイテムを使用するためのホットキー。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ChatVoiceTeam: マイクを使ってチームメンバー全員とコミュニケーションをとる。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_CameraSavedPosition: 保存してある地点にカメラを素早く移動させる。地点を保存するには、Ctrlキー＋カメラポジションのホットキーを押してください。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_SelectAlly: トップバーに表示されている順に味方を選択する。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_AbilityQuickcast: ホットキーが押された時、カーソルがある位置にキャストします。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_ItemQuickcast: ホットキーが押された時、カーソルがある位置にキャストします。
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_QuickcastToggle_OnK: リリース時にキャスト
DOTA_Hotkeys_Tooltip_QuickcastToggle_Nor: クイックキャスト無効
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Autoattack: 近くにいる敵に自動的に移動して攻撃します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoattackSummon: ヒーローと同じオートアタック設定を使用します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoattackNever: ターゲットにしない限りは自動的に攻撃しません。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoattackAfterSpe: 直前に移動、ディナイ、位置の保持、ストップをした場合は自動的に攻撃しません。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoattackAlways: 範囲内にいる敵を常に自動的に攻撃します。
Dota_Settings_Tooltip_Disable_Autoattack: ストップキーを押している間は、選択されたユニットはオートアタックしません。
Dota_Settings_Tooltip_Toggle_Autoattack_: ホールドキーを押している間は「全く行わない」、ストップキーを押している間は「常に行う」にオートアタックを自動的に切り替えます。攻撃命令を出すとこの設定がクリアされて、元々のオートアタック設定に戻ります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_QuickcastOnKeyDown: 有効にすると、キーを離したときでなく、押した瞬間にクイックキャストするようにします。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoPurchase: 推奨されている次のアイテムを購入します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoSelectSummons: 新しいユニットを召喚した時、自動的に選択されているグループに加えます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_DoubleTap: アビリティやアイテムをダブルクリック、またはそれらのホットキーをダブルタップした場合、自分自身にキャストします。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Smart_Doubletap: Altキーを押しながらアビリティやアイテムのホットキーを押すと、ダブルタップになります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_UnifiedOrders: Ctrlキーを押しながら指示を出した場合、コントロールしている全てのユニットに指示が出されます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_TeleportStop: TPスクロール、Boots of Trabel、ツインゲートのテレポートをチャネリングしている最中に、移動やスペルの指示を出しても、チャネリングは中断されません。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ChannelStop: TPスクロールやBoots of Trabelを除くアイテムやアビリティをチャネリングしている最中に、移動や別のアビリティの指示を出しても、チャネリングは中断されません。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Force_Right_Click_: 右クリックで味方ユニットを追従しようとします。
右クリックで味方ユニットを攻撃しようとします。
右クリックで味方ユニットを可能であればディナイ、そうでなければ追従しようとします。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_BroadcasterStats: 観戦時に、配信者が使用している統計のドロップダウンを表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Deceleration: 移動中のカメラが静止するまでの速さ。数値が大きいほど早く止まります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Screenshake: いくつかのスペルやスタンによってカメラが揺れることがあります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_CameraRespawn: 自分のヒーローがリスポーンした時に、カメラを合わせます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Camera_Hold_Select: ヒーロー選択をホールドしているとき、カメラはヒーローを追跡します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_HideProfile: Dota2のプロフィールを見られないようにします。また、SteamのプロフィールをDota2から見られないようにします。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ShareMatchData: パブリックゲームのデータをサードパーティーに公開します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_NetworkQuality: 低速回線を使用している場合、設定を「低速回線を利用している」に合わせると、ネットワークのパフォーマンスが向上する場合があります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_MinimapSimple: アイコンの色をプレイヤー別ではなく、チーム別にします。

DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_MinimapDrawHeroes: Altキーを押したとき、ヒーローの名前ではなくアイコンを表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_MinimapNamesIcon: 常にミニマップにヒーローのアイコンか名前を表示して、AltキーでXとOを一時的に切り替えます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ShopHotkeys: ショップを開いているとき、ショップ用のホットキーを使用するようになります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_QuickTargetAttack: 攻撃キーを押したとき、カーソルがある地点に攻撃します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_QuickMove: 移動キーを押したとき、カーソルがある地点に攻撃します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Healthbar_Hero_Ico: ヒーローのHPバーの隣にヒーローアイコンを表示します。このアイコンはヒーローバッジを隠します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_TargetedAttackMove: 選択されたユニットに攻撃の指示を出すと、現在の位置からではなく、カーソルの位置から最も近いユニットに攻撃します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_LeftClickCameraGri: 有効にすると、カメラグリップをするにはカメラグリップキーと左クリックを押す必要があります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_AutoRepeatRightMou: 右クリックを押している間、右クリック入力を繰り返すようになります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ShopSearchFocusOnO: 有効にすると、ショップを開いたとき初期化された検索窓が選択されます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_PlusUseAssistant: 有効にすると、デフォルトのガイドの代わりに、プラスアシスタントを使用するようになります。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_TurboAutoCourier: 有効にすると、ターボゲームでクーリエが自動配達するようになります。ゲーム中にオン/オフを切り替えることもできます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_BroadcastChannelCh: デフォルトでは、あるチャンネルで受信したメッセージは他のすべてのチャンネルで表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_EnglishHeroNames: 翻訳されたヒーロー名と元の英語名を切り替える。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ALTHero: Altキーを押している間、自分のヒーローの上に緑色の矢印が表示されます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ALTNeutral: Altキーを押している間、中立キャンプのスポーンボックスを表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ALTTower: Altキーを押している間、タワーの攻撃範囲を表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ShowQueuedOrders: HUDにシフト予約された行動のアイコンを表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Bringtofront: マッチが見つかった時、Dota2のクライアントをデスクトップの最前面に表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Bringtofront_Picki: ピックフェーズが始まった時に、Dota2のクライアントをデスクトップの最前面に表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Bringtofront_Unpau: ポーズが解除されたときに、Dota2のクライアントをデスクトップの最前面に表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Bringtofront_Ready: レディーチェックが始まった時に、Dota2のクライアントをデスクトップの最前面に表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_RangeFinder: スペルの範囲を地面に表示します。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_Differentiate: 味方のHPバーは黄色に、自分のHPバーは緑色で表示されます。
DOTA_Settings_Tooltip_ModeNotCompatibleW: This mode is incompatible with Colorblind Mode.

DOTA_HeroComplexity_Description_1: アビリティが単純で、とても扱いやすいヒーローです。
DOTA_HeroComplexity_Description_2: スキルの扱い、タイミング、調整など中程度のテクニックを要求するヒーローです。

DOTA_HeroRole_Description_Jungler: ゲーム序盤にジャングル内の中立クリープで効率的にファームできます。
DOTA_HeroRole_Description_Durable: 集団戦でより長く持ちこたえることのできるアビリティを持っています。
DOTA_HeroRole_Description_Escape: 死から素早く逃げるためのアビリティを持っています。
DOTA_HeroRole_Description_LaneSupport: 序盤のレーン戦で味方のキャリーを守って、ファームをさせるのに向いています。
DOTA_HeroRole_Description_Pusher: ゲームのあらゆる場面で、タワーやバラックを素早く包囲して破壊することができます。
DOTA_HeroRole_Description_Initiator: 集団戦の火蓋を切るのに向いています。

DOTA_Armory_Collection_Info:
コレクションに登録することで、お気に入りのアイテムを素早く見つけることができます。

このパネルにアイテムをドラッグ＆ドロップすると、コレクションビューに追加されます。コレクションビューの外にアイテムをドラッグすると、コレクションからアイテムを削除します。

コレクション内のアイテムは、コレクションと保管庫の両方に表示されます。
DOTA_Armory_Capacity_Info:
If you use over 100% of your Armory space, your Armory will Overflow.

While your Armory is Overflowing, you will be restricted from the following activities:

- Receiving item drops
- Opening item bundles
- Purchasing new items

You can reclaim space in your armory by using Recycling or Deleting items, or by gifting items you no longer want to your friends, all of which can be accessed by right-clicking on their icons.

DOTA_Treasure_DisassembleConfirm_Popup_M: このセットは1個しか持っていません。 リサイクルすると、このバンドルに含まれるアイテムはすべてなくなります。本当に続けますか？
DOTA_Treasure_RecyclingSubtitle_BattlePa: Recycle items from this treasure to receive an additional bonus treasure and a Rylai's Battle Blessing wheel spin.
DOTA_Treasure_RecyclingSubtitle_UnderDra: セットをリサイクルすることでサイドショップで使えるゴールドを獲得できます。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_NoDupeDescripti: それぞれ1つずつ入手するまで重複しません。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_DupeDescription: それぞれ1つずつ入手する前に重複する可能性があります。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_RareTitle: 運が良ければボーナスアイテムが獲得できます。

DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_BonusTreasure: Dota Plus会員はこのトレジャーから出た未開封のバンドルをリサイクルしてプログレスを進めることで、追加のボーナストレジャーとシャードの報酬を獲得することが出来ます。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_BonusTreasureOn: Dota Plus会員はトレジャーから出た未開封のバンドルをリサイクルして、追加のボーナストレジャーを獲得することができます。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_BonusTreasure_B: TI10バトルパスでは、このトレジャーのアイテムをリサイクルして、追加トレジャーやボーナス報酬を獲得することができます。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_BonusTreasuresA: このトレジャーの未開封のバンドルをリサイクルすることで、2つのトレジャーとキーを獲得することができます。
DOTA_OpenTreasureTooltip_RecycleGeneric: Recycle unopened bundles from this treasure to earn progress toward a reward.
DOTA_Treasure_MarketPriceBuy: マーケットで購入する
DOTA_Treasure_ShowHeroNames: ヒーロー名を表示する
DOTA_Treasure_ListViewAltDisplayTooltip: ヒーロー名とアイテム名を切り替える
DOTA_Treasure_UnlockChestExplain_None: 開封には<font color='#FFFFFF'>宝箱と鍵</font>が必要です
DOTA_Treasure_UnlockChestExplain_HasChes: 開封には<font color='#FFFFFF'>鍵</font>が必要です
DOTA_Treasure_UnlockChestExplain_HasKey: 開封には<font color='#FFFFFF'>宝箱</font>が必要です
DOTA_Treasure_TradeUpDescription: リサイクルしてよりティアの高いアイテムにしましょう

DOTA_AASystem_Yellow: Accumulated online game time: {s:playtime}. You have exceeded healthy game time limits. Please take care to rest!
DOTA_AASystem_Red: Accumulated online game time: {s:playtime}. You have exceeded healthy game time limits. It is recommended that you sign offline and rest!
DOTA_AASystemSteam_Red: Remaining online game time today: {s:playtime}.  The game will shut down soon.

DOTA_AA_TimeExpiredCurfew_Message: You can't play this game right now. Please take a break.

DOTA_China_SpecialDisabled: Dear players, in response to relevant notice, title name servers will be out of service from 0:00 to 23:59 on Dec. 6, 2022. Thank you for your support.

DOTA_AntiAddiction_Initial_No_ID_Popup: Your account is not fully registered. Would you like to enter your information now?
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_trans: Determines where the texture is opaque (white is opaque, black is invisible)
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_detailmask: Determines the visibility of the detail map (only if Valve has enabled a detail map on the material). If you want your item to react to a hero's existing arcana, ability or ambient texture effects, you will need to specify the effects display area using this mask.
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_diffusemask: Determines the visibility of the color warp effect (only if the material has the color warp enabled)
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_metalnessma: Determines where color is suppressed to simulate a metallic look
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_selfillumma: Determines where the surface is self-illuminated independent of environment lighting (self-illum color comes from the color texture)
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_specmask: Determines the brightness of the highlights, multiplied by specular intensity from the material
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_rimmask: Determines the highlighting on the edges of the model (rim lighting, also known as fresnel intensity)
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_basetintmas: Determines how much color the specular highlights get from the color texture
DOTA_Workshop_TextureDetails_specexp: Determines the size of the specular highlight, acts as scale of specular exponent value from the material
DOTA_Workshop_CustomSkeleton_Desc: Indicates you are using a skeleton different from the Valve skeleton. This will prevent the Valve-provided default animations from being applied to your model.
DOTA_Workshop_SubmissionType_TeamLogo_De: A logo for a professional Dota team
DOTA_Workshop_LogoMarketingImage_Desc: An image or logo to be used in association with your team. Must be square and at least 600x600, and should have a transparent background suitable for overlay on other images. You must have the rights to use this image.
DOTA_Workshop_BannerMarketingImage_Desc: A banner to be used in association with your team. Must be at least 932x128. You must have the rights to use this image.
DOTA_Workshop_ItemName_Desc: This is the output filename for your item. It isn't seen by players, and must be less than 50 characters long.
DOTA_Workshop_GenericModelName_Desc: This is the name of your imported content, it is used internally at Valve so please use a unique or descriptive name. It isn't seen by players, and must be less than 50 characters long.
DOTA_Workshop_LOD0Desc: This is the optional .DMX or .FBX file that contains the higher resolution skinned geometry for your item. It will be used in portrait, loadout and showcase views. Please check the mesh for missing back faces that will be noticable in loadout or the portrait. If this entry is blank, in-game geometry will be used instead.
DOTA_Workshop_Courier_Ward_LOD1Desc: This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item. It will be used in-game. The model must be in its bind pose with no animation.
DOTA_Workshop_LOD1Desc: This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item. It will be used in-game. If skinned to a Valve skeleton, the model must be in Valve's default bind pose with no animation and the joints must exactly match the scale, positions and rotations of Valve's skeleton.
DOTA_Workshop_Texture_Desc: This is the set of four .TGA files that combine to texture this geometry file. Browse and select any one of the _color, _normal, _mask1, or _mask2 .TGA files, and we'll look for the rest in the same directory.
DOTA_Workshop_LoopingAnim: This is a looping animation - the first and last frames should be identical in order to seamlessly loop.
DOTA_Workshop_RunAnim: This is a run animation - motion will be extracted from the bone named 'root' (base of skeleton if not present).
DOTA_Workshop_DeltaAnim: This is a delta animation - it will be played back layered over another animation. (First frame defines neutral pose.)
DOTA_Workshop_AttackAnim: This is an attack animation - it must be %1 seconds long, and the attack point occurs at %2 seconds into it.
DOTA_Workshop_ParticleSnapshot: This is an effects mesh - it should have at most %1 vertices, and their order may affect the effect visuals.
DOTA_Workshop_TriangleLimit: This mesh must have at most %1 triangles after triangulation.
DOTA_Workshop_CombinedTriangleLimit: Combined, these %1 meshes must have at most %2 triangles after triangulation:
DOTA_Workshop_DisableNICE_Desc: On some textures, the NICE filter we use can result in mipmaps that don't maintain some specific texture detail. If you see this happening with your textures, try turning this option on and see if the textures are more readable.
DOTA_Workshop_Marketing_Desc: A .PSD file containing a selection of marketing images to use when promoting your submission. Click the Marketing Help link to see the requirements, and suggested format, of your .PSD file.
DOTA_Workshop_EffectsModel_Desc: This model will have Valve's default ambient particle system attached to it in-game. This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains vertices specifying where the particle system should be attached along the profile of the weapon.
DOTA_Workshop_HudSkin_Intro: HUD Skins are a set of images that combine to replace the in-game HUD.
DOTA_Workshop_HudSkin_Desc: A set of .PNG files that were produced by the HUD Skin Photoshop export tool. Browse and select any of the .PNG files, and we'll find the rest. They must be in the directory structure created by the export tool.
DOTA_Workshop_CursorPack_Intro: Cursor Packs are a set of images that combine to replace the in-game cursors.
DOTA_Workshop_CursorPack_Desc: A set of .BMP files that represent the variety of cursors for the UI. Also necessary are raw .PNG source for the same cursors. Browse for the icon.png that will be your pack's inventory icon and we'll find the other files.
DOTA_Workshop_LoadingScreen_Intro: An image that replaces the default Dota 2 Loading Screen
DOTA_Workshop_SubmissionType_MusicPack_D: A replacement for all the music in the game, including the main menu and all music heard while in a match.
DOTA_Workshop_MusicMarketingImageDesc: An image or logo to be used in association with your music pack. Must be square and at least 600x600, and should have a transparent background suitable for overlay on other images. You must have the rights to use this image.
DOTA_Workshop_ChatEmoticon_AnimationSpee: Frame time, in milliseconds. Most emoticons use 100 milliseconds per frame.
DOTA_Workshop_ChatEmoticon_DefaultFrame_: The frame to show when the emoticon is not animating. In the range from 0 to the number of frames minus one. Use -1 to automatically chose the last frame. If not specified, will use the first frame (0).
DOTA_Workshop_Error_EmoticonHeight: Bad image height: %1 (Emoticon height must be %2px)
DOTA_Workshop_Error_EmoticonWidth: Bad image width: %1 (Emoticon width must be a multiple of %2px)
DOTA_Workshop_Attachments_Desc: Attachment points are points on the model that the game can use to position certain effects. Each attachment point has both a position and an angle, which it derives from a bone in your model. For each required attachment point, specify the bone name. Once we've built your imported model, the preview will show you the attachment point so you can verify its position.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_HitLocation_Des: Specifies where on the model that incoming enemy projectiles should travel to. A good position is above the center of the model, such as the center of the head in a humanoid.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_LeftEye_Desc: Specifies where on the model to place Unusual particle effects intended for the Left Eye of a creature. Only attach to an eye joint that does not animate or to the head joint. Position on the Left Eye with the red tx arrow pointing forward.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_RightEye_Desc: Specifies where on the model to place Unusual particle effects intended for the Right Eye of a creature. Only attach to an eye joint that does not animate or to the head joint. Position on the Right Eye with the red tx arrow pointing forward.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_AttackPoint_Des: For ranged attack units, this specifies where their attack projectiles should start. For melee units, this is where we spawn hit effects, like blood splashes.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_AttackPoint2_De: When an OFFHAND ATTACK animation is used instead of the base ATTACK, this attack point will be used to spawn hit effects & projectiles.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Mouth_Desc: Specifies where on the model to place particle effects intended for the mouth of the unit.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Ambient_Particl: Specifies where on the model the default ambient particles should be placed.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_BowTop_Desc: Specifies where on the model that the top of the bowstring particle effect should attach.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_BowMid_Desc: Specifies where on the model the middle of the bowstring particle effect should be. Used to bend the bowstring for firing.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_BowBot_Desc: Specifies where on the model that the bottom of the bowstring particle effect should attach.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_LowerStaff: Earth Spirit Lower Staff Attachment point
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_LowerStaff_Desc: Specifies where on the staff model the lower particle effect should attach.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_UpperStaff: Earth Spirit Upper Staff Attachment point
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_UppperStaff_Des: Specifies where on the staff model the upper particle effect should attach.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Head_Particle_A: This attachment specifies the position for default head ambient particles. The bone for the head attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_HitLocation_Aut: Specifies where on the model incoming enemy projectiles should travel to. A good position is above the center of the model. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_AttackPoint_Aut: For ranged attack units, this specifies where their attack projectiles should start. For melee units, this is where we spawn hit effects, like blood splashes. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_AttackPoint2_Au: When an offhand animation is used instead of the base attack, this attack point will be used to spawn hit effects & projectiles. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Mouth_Autofill_: Specifies where the default particles for a creature's bite attack or mouth projectile attack should originate. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. If there is no mouth joint, use the head joint and then position the attachment onto the creature's mouth with the red tx arrow pointing forward. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Eye_Autofill_De: Specifies where on the model to place default particle effects intended for each eye of a creature. The default skeleton bones for these attachments have been filled in.  If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone names. If there are no eye joints, use the head joint and then position the attachments onto each of the creature's eyes with the red tx arrow pointing forward. You will have the option to reposition these attachments after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Wing_Particle_A: These attachments specify positions for default Wing Particle Effects. The default skeleton bones for wing attachments have been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone names. You will have the option to reposition these attachments after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Tail_Autofill_D: The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_RightHand_Autof: Specifies where the default ambient particles for a creature's right hand should originate. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_LeftHand_Autofi: Specifies where the default ambient particles for a creature's left hand should originate. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Lycan_Ult_Jaw_A: This attachment determines where the Wolf's default saliva particles originate. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Lycan_Ult_Mane_: This attachment determines where the Wolf's default ambient mane particles originate. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone name. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Warlock_Golem_M: The default attachment bone names and positions for Warlock Golem's default mane flame particles have already been filled in. If you are using a custom skeleton, you will need to change the bone names. The central mane attachment bones need to be in order starting at the head. You will have the option to reposition attachments after compiling. However, the ambient flame particles will display at origin in the workshop tool. We will enable the particle positions if we decide to ship the item or remove the mane particles if you don't wish to use them.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_HitLocation_Aut: Specifies where on the model incoming enemy projectiles should travel to. A good position is above the center of the model. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_AttackPoint_Aut: For ranged attack units, this specifies where their attack projectiles should start. For melee units, this is where we spawn hit effects, like blood splashes. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_AttackPoint2_Au: When an offhand animation is used instead of the base attack, this attack point will be used to spawn hit effects & projectiles. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Mouth_Autofill_: Specifies where the default particles for a creature's bite attack or mouth projectile attack should originate. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_LeftEye_Autofil: Specifies where on the model to place default particle effects intended for the Left Eye of a creature. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_RightEye_Autofi: Specifies where on the model to place default particle effects intended for the Right Eye of a creature. The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Wing_Particle_A: Attachments for default Wing Particle Effects. The default skeleton bones for these attachments have been filled in. You will have the option to reposition attachments after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Head_Autofill_D: The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Attachment_Body_Autofill_D: The default skeleton bone for this attachment has been filled in. You will have the option to reposition this attachment after compiling.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Desc: Animations are .DMX, or .FBX files, each containing a single animation for your model.
DOTA_Workshop_Error_TooManyBones: %1 contains %2 bones, a maximum of %3 bones are are allowed.
DOTA_Workshop_Error_InvalidBoneName: Invalid bone name "%1" (Must start with upper- or lower-case A-Z or underscore, subsequent characters may include numerals.)
DOTA_Workshop_Error_ManyInvalidBoneNames: Too many invalid bone names detected (%1) - list truncated.
DOTA_Workshop_Error_VMTCount:
The %s1 model is using more than one material. Only one material is allowed for all the LODs in a model.
Materials found:

%s2
DOTA_Workshop_Error_TextureNameA: Cannot recognise the chosen .TGA file name. Textures must end with one of the following suffixes: _color, _normal, _mask1, _mask2
DOTA_Workshop_Error_TextureNameB:
Cannot find a matching .TGA file with the following suffix:
 %s1
DOTA_Workshop_RequiredFile_Name:
Cannot find a required file with the following name:
 %s1
DOTA_Workshop_ZipError_Desc: Failed to create temporary submission zip file at: %s1
DOTA_Workshop_Error_Unskinned: %1: Couldn't find any bones in the wearable that correspond to bones in the hero model. Wearable items must be skinned to the hero's bones to be submitted.
DOTA_Workshop_Error_NoManifest: Zip file does not contain manifest.txt.
DOTA_Workshop_Quicksave_Fail_Desc: Failed to save import state at %s1
DOTA_Workshop_Quickload_Fail_Desc: Failed to load: save file not found at %s1
DOTA_Workshop_NotInTest_Desc: Please use the main Dota 2 client to interact with the Steam Workshop.
DOTA_Workshop_OutOfBudget:
%1 is outside triangle budget:
   %2 contains %3 triangles, when the budget only allows %4.
DOTA_Workshop_CombinedOutOfBudget: Combined triangle count for LOD#%1 is %2, when the budget only allows %3.
DOTA_Workshop_Mat0Desc_Ward: This is the _color .TGA file that textures the geometry files as an Observer Ward. _normal, _mask1, and _mask2 .TGA files are optional for Wards. If we find them in the same directory, we'll use them.
DOTA_Workshop_Mat1Desc_Ward: This is the _color .TGA file that textures the geometry files as a Sentry Ward. _normal, _mask1, and _mask2 .TGA files are optional for Wards. If we find them in the same directory, we'll use them.
DOTA_Workshop_Mat0Desc: This is the set of files that combine to texture your geometry files.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Spawn_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Idle_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view. If available, separate portrait or loadout idles can be submitted with the face at a normal angle.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_HeroSummons_Idle: It may help to have the unit's face or prominent features angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view. If available, separate portrait or loadout idles can be submitted with the face or features at a normal angle.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_IdleAlt_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view. If available, separate portrait or loadout idles can be submitted with the face at a normal angle.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_IdleRare_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view. If available, separate portrait or loadout idles can be submitted with the face at a normal angle.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Run_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_FlyingCourier_Ru: Try using a long animation containing several flying cycles with slight variations in translations and rotations to make the unit look like it's slightly drifting and floating rather than flying locked in a straight line. It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_RunAlt_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_HeroSummons_Run_: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_RunRare_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_RunHaste_Desc: A body attitude that's more angled or streamlined than the regular run can help convey the increase in speed.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_RunInjured_Desc: It may help to have the unit's face angled slightly upward to read better from above in game view.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Courier_Die_Desc: It is not necessary to animate a ground courier sinking into the ground after it dies. This is only necessary for the flying courier death animation.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_FlyingCourier_Di: If your flying courier crashes into the ground on death, let it remain still for a few seconds and then animate it slowly sinking into the ground.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Attack_Desc: Custom attack animations must match the timing of the unit's default attack animations.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_AttackB_Desc: An alternate attack animation to randomly play instead of the ATTACK animation.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Attack_Bite_Desc: An alternate bite attack animation to randomly play instead of the ATTACK animation.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Attack2_Desc: An alternate attack animation to randomly play instead of the ATTACK animation. Hit effects / projectiles will spawn from the OFFHAND ATTACK POINT attachment instead of the base ATTACK POINT.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Attack2B_Desc: An alternate attack animation to randomly play instead of the ATTACK animation. Hit effects / projectiles will spawn from the OFFHAND ATTACK POINT attachment instead of the base ATTACK POINT.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Flail_Desc: A looping animation used when the unit is disabled and being moved (i.e. while cycloned, black holed, launched into the air)
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_TurnPoseCenter_D: A single frame pose of the unit facing forward. Generally you can simply re-use frame 0 of the run animation. If set, you will need to provide Left and Right turn poses.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_TurnPoseLeft_Des: A single frame pose of the unit turning left. As the unit turns left, we'll blend between this pose and the Center pose. If set, you will need to provide Center and Right turn poses.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_TurnPoseRight_De: A single frame pose of the unit turning right. As the unit turns right, we'll blend between this pose and the Center pose. If set, you will need to provide Center and Left turn poses.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_PortraitIdle_Des: If you've raised the head for the in-game idle, have the unit's face at a normal angle to read best in the portrait. Consider toning down the body movement of the unit so that it doesn't drift too far out of the portrait frame.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_PortraitRare_Des: If you've raised the head for the in-game idle, have the unit's face at a normal angle for the portrait. Consider toning down the body movement of the unit so that it doesn't drift too far out of the portrait frame.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_LoadoutIdle_Desc: If you've raised the head for the in-game idle, have the unit's face at a normal angle to read best in the loadout.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_LoadoutRare_Desc: If you've raised the head for the in-game idle, have the unit's face at a normal angle for the loadout and make the start and end poses of this animation match the regular loadout idle start and end poses for smooth transitions.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Center_Desc: Consider this as the center animation.  It will be combined with left and right versions of the same animation so that the unit can smoothly track another units position
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_BackLeft_Desc: This is a complete animation that must have the same number of frames as your center version.  However the unit should twist to aim 179 degrees to the left.  I.e. the bottom of the model should remain facing forward but the upper part should rotate almost completely backwards to the left.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Left_Desc: This is a complete animation that must have the same number of frames as your center version.  However the unit should twist to aim 90 degrees to the left.  I.e. the bottom of the model should remain facing forward but the upper part should rotate directly to the left.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_Right_Desc: This is a complete animation that must have the same number of frames as your center version.  However the unit should twist to aim 90 degrees to the right.  I.e. the bottom of the model should remain facing forward but the upper part should rotate directly to the right.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_BackRight_Desc: This is a complete animation that must have the same number of frames as your center version.  However the unit should twist to aim 179 degrees to the right.  I.e. the bottom of the model should remain facing forward but the upper part should rotate almost completely backwards to the right.
DOTA_Workshop_LD_Trueform_Ability1_Desc: 40 frames long, the summon takes place on frame 15.
DOTA_Workshop_LD_Trueform_Ability2_Desc: 30 frames long, the summon takes place on frame 0.
DOTA_Workshop_LD_Trueform_Ability4_Desc: 40 frames long, the summon takes place on frame 15.
DOTA_Workshop_LD_Trueform_AbilityUlt_Des: Morph back into Druid Form. 70 frames total, should disappear beneath the ground on frame 58.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_IdleOutOfRange_D: This Idle is used when Lone Druid is too far from his bear for it to attack.
DOTA_Workshop_Animation_RunOutOfRange_De: This Run is used when Lone Druid is too far from his bear for it to attack.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Default: Preview the imported item and the currently selected wearable items in game.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Leshrac_Item: Select animations starting with 'staff_' in the list below to see Leshrac holding the weapon in this model viewer. To preview an entire Leshrac set that includes a weapon, prepare the other items first, then submit the weapon as your primary item and add the other wearables before previewing in game.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Nightstalker_: You will need to select and preview the full sets of day and night wearables separately. Access the night version of Night Stalker from the model drop-down menu below before selecting night wearables. Night items will display correctly in loadout once you click the up/down arrow button to change the hero. You will be able to see night items in game once you enable the 'Hunter in the Night' ability and switch the game to night using the 'Toggle Day/Night' button or 'dota_daynightcycle_toggle' in the console.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Death_Prophet: Default cloth simulation won't be applied to models on this page but should be active in the preview loadout and in game.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Undying_Flesh: Flesh Golems can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, cloth and animations. Attack and cast animations may not play correctly for in-game preview. You will be able to preview more animations on this page using the animation drop-down list, though animation layers and cloth will not be enabled. Animation layers and cloth will be added later by Valve if the item ships.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Veno_Ward_Ite: Venomancer Plague Wards can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, and animations. Except for the loadout animation, the animations will preview in this model viewer with the head in one position while the base rotates, which is required for this ward's new aiming system.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Shaman_Ward_I: Shadow Shaman Serpent Wards can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, and animations. Except for the loadout animation, the animations will preview in this model viewer with the head in one position while the base rotates, which is required for this ward's new aiming system.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_DragonKnight_: Elder Dragons can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, cloth and animations. Attack and cast animations may not play correctly for in-game preview. You will be able to preview more animations on this page using the animation drop-down list, though animation layers and wing cloth will not be enabled. Animation layers and cloth will be added later by Valve if the item ships. Test the attack animation on this page to ensure that the mouth of your dragon mesh opens properly.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Lone_Druid_Tr: Lone Druid Trueforms can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, cloth and animations. Attack and cast animations may not play correctly for in-game preview. You will be able to preview more animations on this page using the animation drop-down list, though animation layers and cloth will not be enabled. Animation layers and cloth will be added later by Valve if the item ships.
DOTA_Workshop_Preview_Desc_Visage_Famili: Visage Familiars can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, and animations. Attack animations may not play correctly for in-game preview. You will be able to preview more animations on this page using the animation drop-down list, though animation layers will not be enabled. Animation layers will be added later by Valve if the item ships.
DOTA_Workshop_Death_Prophet_Leg_Mesh_Des: This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the higher resolution skinned geometry for your item. It will be used in portrait, loadout and showcase views. Do not include custom shred mesh. Try to copy the skirt mesh weighting from Valve's hero reference file to ensure correct behavior of the cloth simulation.
DOTA_Workshop_Death_Prophet_Vortex_Mesh_: This is optional custom scrolling shred/vortex geometry to accompany the skirt. It uses the scrolling settings for the default shreds. If you are not submitting custom shreds, leave this entire section empty. If the default grey shreds are needed, Valve can add these.
DOTA_Workshop_Undying_Flesh_Golem_Mesh_L: CUSTOM FLESH GOLEMS CAN ONLY USE VALVE'S DEFAULT SKELETON, JOINT POSITIONS, CLOTH, AND ANIMATIONS. This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item that will be displayed in-game. If you choose to skin mesh to the cloth joints, you will not be able to test Golem cloth simulation in the workshop tool. Valve's cloth simulation will be added later if the item ships. Because this model uses Valve's default 62 bone Golem skeleton, it is allowed to exceed the current 60 bone limit. The model must be in its bind pose with no animation. The joints must exactly match the scale, positions and rotations of Valve's bind pose.
DOTA_Workshop_Lone_Druid_True_Form_Mesh_: Lone Druid True Forms can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, cloth and animations. This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item that will be displayed in-game. If you choose to skin mesh to the cloth joints, you will not be able to test True Form cloth simulation in the workshop tool. Valve's cloth simulation will be added later if the item ships. The model must be in its bind pose with no animation. The joints must exactly match the scale, positions and rotations of Valve's bind pose.
DOTA_Workshop_Dragon_Knight_Dragon_Mesh_: Elder Dragons can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions, cloth and animations. This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item that will be displayed in-game. Please model a mouth that can open and weight the lower jaw to the jaw bone since the dragon needs to open its mouth for attacks. The model must be in its bind pose with no animation. The joints must exactly match the scale, positions and rotations of Valve's bind pose.

This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the higher resolution skinned geometry for your item. It will be used in portrait, loadout and showcase views. If this entry is blank, in-game geometry will be used instead.
DOTA_Workshop_Visage_Familiar_Mesh_Lod1_: Custom Familiars can only use Valve's default skeleton, joint positions and animations. This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item that will be displayed in-game. The model must be in its bind pose with no animation. The joints must exactly match the scale, positions and rotations of Valve's bind pose.
DOTA_Workshop_No_Anim_Mesh_Lod1_Desc: This ability model can only use Valve's default skeleton and animations. This is the .DMX or .FBX file that contains the skinned geometry for your item that will be displayed in-game. The model must be in its bind pose with no animation. The joints must exactly match the scale, positions and rotations of Valve's bind pose.

DOTA_FantasyHelpOverview3: 3. ファンタジーポイントを獲得
DOTA_FantasyHelpTitle1: プレイヤーカードパックを開封
DOTA_FantasyHelpText1: 各パックにはシルバーまたはゴールドカードを含む5枚のカードが入っています。シルバーカードは3つの、ゴールドは5つのランダムな統計ボーナスがついています。
DOTA_FantasyHelpTitle2: ファンタジーロースターにカードを設置
DOTA_FantasyHelpText2: {g:dota_event_league_name:eventid}の各日程のファンタジーロースターに2枚のコアプレイヤーカード、1枚のミッドプレイヤーカード、2枚のサポートプレイヤーカードを置きましょう。
DOTA_FantasyHelpText2b: 各期間 (概ね1週間) のファンタジーロースターに2枚のコアプレイヤーカード、1枚のミッドプレイヤーカード、2枚のサポートプレイヤーカードを置きましょう。
DOTA_FantasyHelpTitle3: ファンタジーポイントの獲得
DOTA_FantasyHelpText3: 名簿に登録したカードのプレイヤーがその期間中の試合でどのくらい活躍したかによってファンタジーポイントを獲得できます。シルバー、ゴールドカードはより多くのポイントを獲得できます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpTitle4: バトルポイントを稼ぐ
DOTA_FantasyHelpText4: {g:dota_event_league_name:eventid}終了後、他のコミュニティと比べてどのくらいファンタジーポイントを稼いだかに応じてバトルポイントを獲得します。
DOTA_FantasyHelpText4_compendium: {g:dota_event_league_name:eventid}終了後、集めたファンタジーポイントに応じてコンペンディウムポイントを獲得することができます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpText4b: 各期間の終わりに、その期間のファンタジーポイントに基づいてレベルを獲得することができます。報酬は、現在の総合的なファンタジーレベルに基づいて確定されます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpTitle4_compendium: コンペンディウムポイントを獲得
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsRegionHeader: 地域ごとのファンタジー
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsRegionSub1: DPCの各地域はそれぞれのファンタジーリーグです。複数の地域のリーグに参加することも可能です。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsRegionSub2: 期間中のファンタジーリーグでのベストパフォーマンスに基づいて、ファンタジーレベルを獲得します。例えば、あるリーグで上位10％、別のリーグで上位50％の成績を収めた場合、上位10％の成績に応じたポイントを獲得できます。各地域リーグの報酬は重複しません。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub1Text3: +0.003 × ラストヒット/ディナイ pt
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub1Text7: +3 × チームファイト参加率 pt
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub1Text9: +0.5 × キャンプスタック pt
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub1Text11: +4 × ファーストブラッド数 pt
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text1: 各プレイヤーパックは1枚以上のシルバーまたはゴールドカードを含む5枚のプレイヤーカードが含まれています。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text2: シルバー、ゴールドカードの統計ボーナスは +5% から +25% の範囲のうちランダムに設定されています。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text3: シルバーカードは3つのボーナス、ゴールドカードは5つのボーナスを持っています。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text4: 重複したプレイヤーカードは同じ日に使用することはできません。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text4b: 重複したプレイヤーカードは同じ期間に使用することはできません。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text5: 各日程の名簿はそれぞれ独立しており、プレイヤーカードは複数の日程で使うことができます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub2Text5b: 各期間の名簿は独立していて、1枚の選手カードを複数の期間で使用することができます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text1: {g:dota_event_league_name:eventid}の試合でファンタジーポイントを得ることができます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text1b: {s:tour_name}中のディビジョンIの試合は、すべてファンタジープレイが適用されます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text2: 2本先取(Bo3)の内、最もスコアの高い2つのゲームがプレイヤーのスコアに加算されます。同期間中に複数試合を行った場合、最も得点の高かった試合のみがカウントされます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text3: 3本先取(Bo5)の内、最もスコアの高い3つのゲームがプレイヤーのスコアに加算されます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text4: 名簿は各日程の中国標準時午前9時に固定されます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text4_2021: 名簿は各日程の9:00 午前 EEST (GMT+3) (日本時間{t:t:daily_start_time})に固定されます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub3Text4b_2021: 名簿は各期間の{t:t:daily_start_time} (あなたの地域) に固定されます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4: プレイヤーカードパック
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4Text1: 特定のバトルパスレベルに到達すると、報酬として追加のプレイヤーカードパックを獲得できます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4Text1_compend:
毎日1回試合に勝利することで、追加のプレイヤーパックを獲得できます。
チームパックはサポータークラブで獲得できるほか、プレイヤーカードタブから直接購入することもできます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4Text1b:
毎日1回試合に勝利することで、追加のプレイヤーパックを獲得できます。
チームパックは近日中にプレイヤーカードタブから直接購入できるようになります。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4Text2: プレイヤーカードとプレイヤーカードパックの有効期限は{g:dota_event_league_name:eventid}バトルパスと同じです。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4Text2_compend: プレイヤーカードとプレイヤーカードパックの有効期限は{g:dota_event_league_name:eventid} Compendiumと同じです。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub4Text2b: プレイヤーカードおよびプレイヤーカードパックの有効期限は、{s:tour_name}終了時までです。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text1: 合計得点上位10%のファンタジーチームには16,000バトルポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text2: 合計得点上位25%のファンタジーチームには8,000バトルポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text3: 合計得点上位50%のファンタジーチームには4,000バトルポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text1_Daily_c: 各日程の得点上位10%のファンタジーチームには800コンペンディウムポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text2_Daily_c: 各日程の得点上位25%のファンタジーチームには400コンペンディウムポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text3_Daily_c: 各日程の得点上位50%のファンタジーチームには200コンペンディウムポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text1_compend: 合計得点上位10%のファンタジーチームには6,000コンペンディウムポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text2_compend: 合計得点上位25%のファンタジーチームには3,000コンペンディウムポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text3_compend: 合計得点上位50%のファンタジーチームには1,500コンペンディウムポイントが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text1_Period_: 各期間の得点上位10%のファンタジーチームには4ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text2_Period_: 各期間の得点上位25%のファンタジーチームには3ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text3_Period_: 各期間の得点上位50%のファンタジーチームには2ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text4_Period_: それ以下のファンタジーチームには1ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyHelpDetailsSub5Text5_Period_: 4ファンタジーレベルごとに700シャード受け取ることができます。それ以外のレベルでは、350シャードを受け取ることができます。
各レベルごとにバトルパスポイントを受け取ることができます。また、4レベルごとにボーナスバトルパスポイントを受け取ることが出来ます。
DOTA_FantasyLevelTooltip:
得点上位10%のチームには3ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。

得点上位25%のチームには2ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。

得点上位50%のチームには1ファンタジーレベルが与えられます。
DOTA_FantasyTreasureTooltip:
4ファンタジーレベルごとにLineage Treasureを1つ受け取れます。

観戦タブのメニューからトレジャーを受け取ることができます。

DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_acti_title: ACT I: The Sands of Fate
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_acti_intro: In the deepest recesses of Dark Reef prison, a dormant evil stirs—the fiendish Siltbreaker—waking to thoughts of freedom and a campaign of retribution to come. Only in the heart of the Kalabor Desert might we find the means to stop him... Our final chance to seize a shard of hope.
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_acti_intro_acti: As the fiend Siltbreaker plots an escape from Dark Reef prison, his enemies in the Conclave of the Brine assemble a band of warriors to take up arms against him. For the adventurers who answer the Conclave's call, the road to Dark Reef begins near the sands of Kalabor, where Siltbreaker's twisted creation, Rhyzik the Corruptor, gathers strength to aid his master's plans...
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_zonestar_pop: Complete a zone with higher star values for better rewards
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_easy_mode:
Adventure Mode is for players who wish to experience the full Campaign with less challenge.

Star Ratings are not achieved and no rewards are given.

Artifacts do not drop in Adventure Mode.
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_actii_title: ACT II: A Vault in the Deep
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_actii_intro: Rhyzik the Corruptor has fallen, and the Conclave's defenders now turn to the true task at hand: the impossible journey into Dark Reef Prison. As they step through the wisp emissary's portal, daylight breaks across a frozen waste. The path ahead will traverse a bitter precipice overlooking Reef's Edge, and then the depths beneath which Siltbreaker's vault awaits...
DOTA_ti7_campaign_bp_tab_info_body: This summer, all Battle Pass owners are invited to undertake a cooperative adventure into the blackest depths of Dark Reef. Coming soon, this all-new campaign calls upon you to party up with three friends or queue-met allies to battle through a diverse landscape of loathsome monsters, cunning traps, and other lethal terrors. You'll earn spins on the Wheel of Rewards as you play, with a crack at the exclusive Desert Sands Baby Roshan and other prizes.
DOTA_campaign_siltbreaker_desc: Battle through a diverse landscape of loathsome monsters, cunning traps, and other lethal terrors.

DOTA_Socketing_Tooltip: ソケットにジェムを入れてアイテムを拡張できます。コモンソケットを追加するには熟練工の彫刻刀を、コモンジェムを抽出するには熟練工の金槌を使用します。
DOTA_RareSocketing_Tooltip: レアソケットには、トレジャーからのレアドロップでしか入手できないアイテムの装飾効果を含んでいます。レアジェムは匠の金槌を使って取り出すことができますが、その際にアイテムが破壊されてしまいます。
DOTA_Socketing_ExtractRareGems_Tooltip: レアジェムを抽出するには、匠の金槌が必要です。アイテムは破壊されます。レアジェムを抽出をクリックすると、ハンマーを持っていない場合は、ハンマーを購入するオプションが表示されます。
DOTA_Socketing_AddSocket_Tooltip: コモンソケットを追加するには熟練工の彫刻刀が必要です。彫刻刀が無い場合、ソケットの追加をクリックすると購入画面が表示されます。
DOTA_Socketing_ExtractGem_Tooltip: コモンジェムを抽出するには、熟練工の金槌が必要です。金槌を持っていない場合は、「ジェムを抽出する」ボタンをクリックすると、購入画面が表示されます。
DOTA_Socketing_ExtractOrResetGem_Tooltip: Resetting a gem will clear the gem's tracking statistic counter. Removing a gem requires an Artificer's Hammer. Clicking Extract will give you an option to purchase one if you don't have any.
DOTA_Socketing_Replace_Tooltip: レアジェムを交換すると、ソケット内にあったジェムは破壊されます。

DOTA_TributeTreasure_Description: Tribute Upgrade Infuserを使用することで、アイテムの環境エフェクトをアンロックすることができます。
DOTA_Winter2016_InfusedTreasure_Descript: Use a Winter 2016 Infuser to permanently unlock special ambient effects on some of the items contained within this treasure.

DOTA_CoinTreasure_Title: 2015年秋コンペンディウムクラフティング
DOTA_CoinTreasure_Description: コイントレジャーを開けると、ブロンズ、シルバー、ゴールドのいずれかのアイテムがもらえます。3つの下位アイテムを組み合わせて1つの上位アイテムにしたり、2つのゴールドアイテムを別のアイテムに交換したりすることができます。
DOTA_NestedTreasureII_Description: Nested Treasure IIを開封時、Set Redemption Tokenを入手することがあります。運良くトークンを手に入れたら、保管庫からトークンを使用し、Nested Treasure IIにあるセットの中から好きなものを獲得することができます。
DOTA_SoaringCacheTreasure_Title: ボーナスキャッシュを獲得しよう！
DOTA_SoaringCacheTreasure_Description: 1月1日までにSoaring Cachesを5つ開封するごとに、コンペンディウムレベルやレアアイテムが入ったボーナスキャッシュを1つ獲得することができます。
DOTA_FlutteringCacheTreasure_Title: ボーナスキャッシュを獲得しよう！
DOTA_FlutteringCacheTreasure_Description: 1月1日までにSoaring Cachesを5つ開封するごとに、コンペンディウムレベルやレアアイテムが入ったボーナスキャッシュを1つ獲得することができます。
DOTA_SoaringCacheTreasure_BonusButton: ボーナスキャッシュを見る

DOTA_TI7CollectorsCacheTreasure_Descript: After opening 10 caches, you'll earn an International Set Redemption Token that you can activate from your armory to claim your choice of ANY non-rare set featured within the Collector's Cache.
DOTA_SplashAd_FallMajorCompendium_Descri: Earn exclusive items and sets, take on new challenges, and win big with Coin Wagers. Only {g:dota_item_price:compendium_itemdef}!
DOTA_SplashAd_FallMajorSoaringCache_Desc: Available exclusively to Compendium owners. Open a Soaring Cache to claim new sets created by the community. Plus, every fifth you open will yield a Bonus Cache!
DOTA_Leaf_Halloween2015_SubTitle: A New Custom Game from Valve
DOTA_Leaf_Halloween2015_Desc: Two teams of five fight for territorial control, in an all-out battle for dominance.
DOTA_Leaf_Halloween2015_Capture_Desc:
Capture Control Points (CPs) by standing on them. Earn points for your team when you own three or more CPs.

The more CPs you own, the faster you earn points.
DOTA_Leaf_Halloween2015_Control_Desc:
Slow down or block enemies capturing a point by standing on the contested CP.

Use the Glyph of Fortification to temporarily block enemy captures.
DOTA_Leaf_Halloween2015_Tricks_Desc:
Step on trap triggers to fight enemies from afar. Watch out! Spike Traps and Pendulum Traps will also hurt you and your teammates.

For every 1000 points the enemy earns, friendly Behemoths spawn to fight for you.
DOTA_Leaf_Halloween2015_Win_Desc:
The first team to 5000 points wins the game.

Slay your enemies to collect treats that restore your health, mana, or grant additional gold.
FrontPage_Halloween2015_Haunted_Colosseu: A New Custom Game from Valve
FrontPage_Debut_Arc_Warden_Desc: A splintered fragment of the same primordial power as the Ancients themselves, Zet the Arc Warden has pledged to see the clash between Radiant and Dire finally end, by reunification or annihilation.
FrontPage_Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Desc: The faithless shall tremble as true thunder rolls across the fields of battle!
FrontPage_Debut_Underlord_Desc: Conjure waves of abyssal flame to immolate enemies held paralyzed in your spiteful grip. Feast upon the carnage of battle, gaining strength as foes perish around you, their attacks diminished by your very presence. Tear a rift in reality to teleport yourself and your teammates across the map, delivering bloody retribution to any who would defy the will of Vrogros the Underlord.
FrontPage_Debut_Underlord_Cell_Desc: The abyssal invader steps through his Dark Rift, eager for new lands to conquer. Underlord arrives, bringing with him a new Post-Game Summary and the addition of Teammate Stats.
FrontPage_Debut_Grimstroke_Desc: Grimstroke glides into battle to paint the outcome as he sees fit, served by inky phantoms and armed with his corrupted runebinder's brush...
FrontPage_Debut_MonkeyKing_Desc: Always in search of a good fight, Monkey King travels atop the trees aiming to spring from leafy cover and surprise his enemies. Calling upon an army of monkey soldiers to overwhelm opponents, this agile trickster revels in the chaos of battle, ready to slam his legendary staff down on any hopes of escape.
FrontPage_Title_Io_Arcana_Desc: Available to all Battle Pass owners over level 245, the Benevolent Companion Arcana imbues Io with the form and function of the best friend anyone could ask for.
FrontPage_700_Text: This release marks the debut of the new hero Monkey King as well as intoducing new Hero Talent Trees and much much more.
FrontPage_BattlePassBundle_spring2021_Li: +60 バトルパスレベル
+6x Nemestice イモータルトレジャー
+3x Nemestice テーマトレジャー
FrontPage_Fall_2016_BattlePass_Desc: Filled with quests, treasures, and rewards, the Fall 2016 Battle Pass is your companion for the Dota 2016 fall season.
FrontPage_Winter_2017_BattlePass_Desc: Filled with quests, treasures, and rewards, the Winter 2017 Battle Pass is your companion for the Dota 2017 winter season.
FrontPage_Fall_2016_Treasure2_Desc: Now available for Battle Pass owners to earn as a Battle Level reward or purchase in the Dota 2 store. Contains item sets for Lion, Silencer, Storm Spirit, Dark Seer, and Treant Protector, as well as escalating odds to unlock a Very Rare Spirit Breaker item set or Extremely Rare Juggernaut item set that includes a new critical attack animation.
FrontPage_Fall_2016_Treasure3_Desc: Now available for Battle Pass owners to earn as a Battle Level reward or purchase in the Dota 2 store. Contains item sets for Ember Spirit, Templar Assassin, Lich, Bloodseeker, and Winter Wyvern, as well as escalating odds to unlock a Very Rare Undying item set that includes a special Flesh Golem or Extremely Rare Shadow Fiend item set.
FrontPage_Fall_2016_Treasure4_Desc: Now available for Battle Pass owners to earn as a Battle Level reward or purchase in the Dota 2 store. Contains item sets for Wraith King, Meepo, Invoker, Nature's Prophet, and Luna, as well as escalating odds to unlock a Rare Lycan item set or Extremely Rare Alchemist item set that includes a new Unstable Concoction spell effect.
FrontPage_Winter_2017_Treasure2_Desc: Now available for Battle Pass owners to earn as a Battle Level reward or purchase in the Dota 2 store. Contains item sets for Silencer, Lifestealer, Underlord, Lina, Death Prophet, Broodmother, Batrider, and Keeper of the Light, as well as escalating odds to unlock a Very Rare Sniper item set or Extremely Rare Disruptor item set.
FrontPage_Winter_2017_Treasure3_Desc: Now available for Battle Pass owners to earn as a Battle Level reward or purchase in the Dota 2 store. Contains item sets for Nyx Assassin, Razor, Gyrocopter, Windranger, Weaver, Chen, and Naga Siren, as well as escalating odds to unlock a Very Rare Rubick item set or Extremely Rare Dragon Knight item set.
FrontPage_Details_Siltbreaker_Intro: Later this month, embark on the very first four-player Dota Campaign—new for owners of the International 2017 Battle Pass.
FrontPage_Details_Terrain_Reef_Details: The chaos of battle sinks to new levels in these aquatic trappings. Reach Battle Level 150 to unlock this exclusive Terrain.
FrontPage_Treasure_Emerald_Revival_Desc: Now available for purchase in the Dota 2 store. Contains item sets for Naga Siren, Necrophos, Monkey King, Enigma, Rubick, Shadow Fiend, Abaddon, and Clockwerk, as well as escalating odds to unlock a Very Rare Terrorblade item set.
FrontPage_Treasure_Singles_Day_Desc: Contains item sets for Witch Doctor, Winter Wyvern, Omni Knight, Chen, Phoenix, Timbersaw, Shadow Demon, Spirit Breaker, Spectre, and Viper.
FrontPage_Frostivus_2017_Treasure_Desc: Win three games of Dota before the end of the Frostivus season to receive one free Frostivus 2017 Treasure!
FrontPage_Winter_2019_Treasure_Desc: Featuring very rare and extremely rare sets for Ursa and Tiny, as well as sets for Alchemist, Bane, Leshrac, Dark Willow, Mirana, and more.
FrontPage_NewBloom2020_Treasure_Desc: Featuring very rare and extremely rare sets for Puck, Legion Commander and Templar Assassin, as well as sets for Kunkka, Arc Warden, Dazzle and more.
FrontPage_February2020_Treasure_Desc: Featuring very rare and extremely rare sets for Wraith King and Phoenix, as well as sets for Clockwerk, Beastmaster, Oracle, and more.
FrontPage_Frostivus_Treasure_Desc: Contains unique Frostivus season sets for many of your favorite heroes!
FrontPage_Frostivus_2017_Game_Mode_Desc: Queue up to enter the fray and compete against friends and strangers alike in a madcap series of Frostivus Festival mini-games!
FrontPage_Custom_Game_Dota_Auto_Chess_Te: A custom game created by Drodo Studio!
FrontPage_RankedSeason3_Text: Rank Medals have been reset. Play ranked matches now to recalibrate.
FrontPage_DrowRemodel_Text: A refinement on Traxex's distinctive features.
FrontPage_DotaPlusUpdates_Header: Dota Plus アップデート
FrontPage_DotaPlus_Jan2019_Text: 4 New Exclusive Sets available in the Plus Rewards store. Seasonal Quests are now available.
FrontPage_DotaPlusUpdates_Summer2022_Gen: バトルレポートアップデート
FrontPage_DPC_SpringTour2022_Title: DPC春季ツアー & ファンタジー
FrontPage_DPC_SpringTour2022_Text: DPC春季ツアーが3月14日に開幕します。ファンタジーをプレイしましょう！
FrontPage_DPC_SpringTreasure2022_Title: DPC春のファンタジートレジャー
FrontPage_DPC_SpringTreasure2022_Text: 春季DPCファンタジーを遊んで、Lineage Treasureをゲットしましょう！4ファンタジーレベルごとに1つ受け取ることができます。
FrontPage_DPC_SpringMajor2022_Title: ストックホルムメジャー 5月12日 - 22日
FrontPage_DPC_SpringMajor2022_Text: 世界中のチームがDPC2022春季ツアーを締めくくるストックホルムメジャーに集結します。
FrontPage_DPC_SpringMajor2022_Fantasy_Ti: ファンタジーをプレイして、トレジャーを獲得しよう。
FrontPage_DPC_SpringMajor2022_Fantasy_Te: ファンタジーレベルを上げて、シャードや宝箱の報酬を受け取りましょう。
FrontPage_DPC_SpringMajor2022_SupClub_Te: メジャー終了までの販売となります。
FrontPage_DPC_SpringMajor2022_Complete_T: Congratulations to OG for winning the Stockholm Major.

FrontPage_DPC_SummerMajor2022_Winner_Des: Congratulations to Team Spirit for winning The Arlington Major.

dpc_event_springmajor22: ストックホルムメジャー
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Lore: Forged by the Hammers of Celestarr, this mighty helm feels at home resting across the brow of the Lord of Heaven himself.
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Equip: When equipped, this item grants these custom upgrades to Zeus
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Feature1: New base model, texture, and all-new animations
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Feature2: New effect, sound, and kill effect for Thundergod's Wrath
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Feature3: Special Blink effect and sound when using a Blink Dagger
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Feature4: Custom Portrait, hero icon, minimap icon, and ability icons
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Feature7: A tempest-cloud chariot to carry His Majesty
Debut_Arcana_Zeus_Exalted: Purchase by December 31st 2015, to receive as 'EXALTED' Quality
Debut_Journey_Terrain_Text: Replace your old stomping grounds with the lands of The King's New Journey, a brand-new equippable terrain now available for purchase.
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Lore: Relive three epic trials from his earliest adventures with the Great Sage's Reckoning.
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Equip: When equipped, this item grants these custom upgrades to Monkey King
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Feature1: New base model, texture, and all-new animations
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Feature2: Dynamic Style that changes according to the level of Wukong's Ultimate
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Feature3: A cloud-riding run animation when travelling vast distances in a short period of time
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Feature4: Custom Portrait per Form, hero icon, minimap icon
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Feature5: Altered Voice and additional voice responses for style changes and cloud animation
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Exalted: Purchase by January 31st 2017, to receive as 'EXALTED' Quality
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Form1_Lore: The oldest tales say he hatched from a magic stone, bursting one day from a massive boulder that had borne silent witness to the entirety of creation. But only children and fools put stock in such things.
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Form2_Lore: To seek a weapon worthy of his talents, Sun Wukong called upon the King of the Eastern Seas, known to hoard many great treasures lost to the lands above. He would find it is not treasure alone hiding in the blackest depths.
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Form3_Lore: Not content to live as the greatest warrior of his own time, Sun Wukong traversed the path to the underworld to steal his name from the Book of Life and Death and become a living legend for all of time. But nothing comes without its price.
Debut_Arcana_MonkeyKing_Form4_Lore: Seeking to restore balance to nature and prevent further crimes, Sun Wukong's enemies conspired to lock him in a furnace, intending to purge his heavenly powers in the purifying flames of the Eternal Crucible. The flames only made him stronger.
FrontPage_MonkeyKing2: New Hero to the Dota Universe
FrontPage_Patch720_Description:
• New Abilities
• New Terrain
• Dedicated Teleport Item Slot
• Much More...
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Equip: When equipped, this item grants these custom upgrades to Juggernaut:
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature1: New base model and textures with custom dragon ambient effects
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature2: Custom kill effect that triggers after lethal crits or Omnislash, or on Triple Kills and higher
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature3: All-new effects for: Blade Dance, Bladefury (works with existing custom Bladefury effects), and Omnislash
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature4: Custom Portrait, hero icon, ability icons, and minimap icon
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature7: A Dragon Spirit ancestor to aid the Juggernaut in times of need
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature8: All-new animations for: Loadout, Alternate Run, Teleport, Victory
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature10: Gem that tracks number of heroes killed during Omnislash
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Feature11: Overhead effect that shows number of Omnislash kills tracked on gem
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Exalted: Purchase by March 31, 2017 to receive 'EXALTED' Quality
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Lore: Yurnero's mask has been cleaved in two, awakening the ancient souls that once laid dormant inside it. These spirits have become one with Yurnero, giving him both the wisdom and fury of his ancestors. This symbiotic relationship has transformed the Juggernaut into something new and terrifying... a celestial force of nature.
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Lore_FrontPage: Yurnero's mask has been cleaved in two, awakening the ancient souls that once laid dormant inside it.
Debut_Arcana_Juggernaut_Style2_Lore: Kill 10 enemies with Omnislash to unlock the Bladeform Origins form.
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Equip: When equipped, this item grants these custom upgrades to Pudge:
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature1: New base model and textures with custom Arcana pedestal
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature8: All-new effects for: Dismember and Hook Streak Counter
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature3: Custom milestone counter effects for Hook Streaks
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature2: Custom Dismember flesh effects for different heroes
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature4: Custom portrait, hero icon, ability icons, and minimap icon
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature9: Altered Voice with hundreds of new responses
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature10: All-new animations for: Loadout, Alternate Run, Rare Idles, Long- and short-range Dismember, Hook Streaks, and more
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Feature7: Celebrate Pudge's slim Arcana Vote victory over Rubick with an Alternate Unlockable Grand Abscession Style — earned by defeating an enemy Rubick's team in 12 games
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Exalted: Purchase by May 4, 2018 to receive 'EXALTED' Quality
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Lore: An animate mass of defiled chains has tried to putrefy Pudge's resilient heaps of flesh. Enchanted at the forge of the benevolent Crella of Vennepra, but turned to dark purpose by the rhythm of the Dirge, the Chains of Abscession have finally found a victim—and new master—impervious to their virulent decay.
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Lore_FrontPage: An animate mass of defiled chains has tried to putrefy Pudge's resilient heaps of flesh...
Debut_Arcana_Pudge_Style2_Lore: Win 12 games with Rubick on the enemy team to unlock the Grand Abscession form.
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Equip: When equipped, this item grants these custom upgrades to Rubick:
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature1: A style progression system that features custom effects for 115 stolen abilities
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature2: Custom dynamic color effects on the cape that change depending on stolen spells
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature3: A complete set of all-new animations, including cast animations, death animations, run animations, unique stolen spell animations, and more
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature4: New base model, texture, and custom animated pedestal
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature5: New effect and sound for Spell Steal
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature6: Support for dynamic color effects on the Crux of Perplex Immortal Item
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature7: Custom ground effect for players who complete the style progression
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Feature9: Custom Hero Portrait, Minimap Icon, and Stolen Spell Icon Border Effect
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Exalted: Purchase by January 21, 2019 to receive 'EXALTED' Quality
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Lore: The secret at the heart of the Puzzle of Perplex has helped Rubick harness the power to alter the very foundations of magic itself. No longer limited to masterful mimicry, Rubick toys with the boundaries of arcane artistry, reshaping the world of magic as he sees fit; always hungry for new preternatural mysteries to unravel and respool, and the undiscovered kingdoms of magic they too might reveal.
Debut_Arcana_Rubick_Lore_FrontPage: The Grand Magus has unearthed the secrets at the heart of the puzzles of Perplex...
Debut_ESArcana_Lore:
He who was one with the spirit of this earth has now merged with a fragment from another world.

Flooded with distant memories of a shattered land, and bearing fresh scars from those responsible for its destruction, Earthshaker feels for the first time in his life a longing to look towards the heavens, to somehow understand the apocalyptic end that found his sister earth...and do whatever it takes to avenge her passing.
Debut_ESArcana_Lore_Pt2: Flooded with distant memories of a shattered land, and bearing fresh scars from those responsible for its destruction, Earthshaker feels for the first time in his life a longing to look towards the heavens, to somehow understand the apocalyptic end that found his sister earth...and do whatever it takes to avenge her passing.
Debut_Earthshaker_Arcana_Feature_Combo: Chain abilities against your enemies in a short period of time to increase the combo counter above Earthshaker's head. Once your combo ends, you'll see the total damage dealt throughout the shakedown, so your enemies will always know how big a chunk you took from them in a fight.
Debut_Earthshaker_Arcana_Feature_Immmort: Earthshaker’s Judgement of the Fallen Immortal totem from this year's Battle Pass now features an additional style that causes it to take on the same arcane color signatures as the style selected on the Arcana item.
ESArcana_Feature_One_Desc: Earthshaker's model and loadout pedestal have been redesigned from the earth up, reflecting the celestial gifts he has received, and the toll such bestowal required.
ESArcana_Feature_Two_Desc: Features all-new animations, combo counter, new Echo Slam effects, a custom death effect for heroes killed by Echo Slam, new ambient effects, enhanced Aghanim's Echant Totem effects, custom Blink Dagger effect, and a custom stun effect.
ESArcana_Feature_Three_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, and a Minimap Icon for both styles.
ESArcana_Feature_Seven_Desc: Earn 500 Kills or Assists with Echo Slam to unlock the Burning Descent alternate style.
Debut_Persona_KidInvoker_Lore:
Aeons before he was recognized as the most dangerous magician alive...

...the Invoker endured scholastic life as the adolescent star pupil at an ancient wizard's academy. Even as he excelled at every task set before him, and basked in the praise such aptitude afforded, the young Invoker dreamt of a future in which he answered to no one but himself, where he might finally be free to wield his growing powers however he saw fit.

Now, harnessing dangerous magics purloined from his headmaster's secret archives, young Carl has discovered the means to journey forward into his own timeline. Eager to insert himself prematurely into the moment of his greatest triumph, Carl is determined to prove to the world that aged or not, the illustrious arts of the Invoker can be bested by no one.
Debut_Persona_KidInvoker_Feature_One_Des: The models for Invoker, his ability orbs, and his Forged Spirit have all been replaced by the versions from his younger self's earliest days as a master magician.
Debut_Persona_KidInvoker_Feature_Two_Des: This Persona features all-new animations to turn back the clock a few millenia and help keep Kid Invoker limber and ready for battle. Armed with powerful magics that cannot be contained, he also has custom attack particles that change depending on which ability orbs are active.
Debut_Persona_KidInvoker_Feature_Three_D: Kid Invoker also includes all-new Hero Portraits, Ability Icons, and Minimap icon.
Debut_DuelingFates_Bundle_Title: Emblems of the Dueling Fates Bundle
Debut_DuelingFates_BundleName: Emblems of the Dueling Fates Bundle
Debut_DuelingFates_DarkWillow_Bundle_Des: item and Custom Taunt for Dark Willow
Debut_DuelingFates_PartOf: Included in the Emblems of the Dueling Fates Bundle:
Debut_DuelingFates_DarkWillow_Item_Desc1: The Sunbreeze Birthright — Immortal belt item with ambient effects and a custom effect for Dark Willow's Bramble Maze ability
Debut_DuelingFates_DarkWillow_Item_Desc2: Etienne's Revenge — Immortal off-hand item with ambient effects and a custom effect and sound for Pangolier's Swashbuckle ability
Debut_DuelingFates_DarkWillow_Item_Desc3: Pholi the Squire — Faithful Courier and self-appointed squire to Donté the Pangolier
Debut_DuelingFates_DarkWillow_Item_Desc4: Curious Snaptrap — A strain of wards once grown only by Revtel royalty
Debut_DuelingFates_DarkWillow_Item_Desc5: Two new taunts for the arriving heroes — 'Thorns and All' for Dark Willow & 'Foolish Gallantry' for Pangolier
Debut_DuelingFates_TheresMore: The Emblems of the Dueling Fates Bundle also includes:
Debut_DuelingFates_Pangolier_Bundle_Desc: item and Custom Taunt for Pangolier
Debut_Grimstroke_Lore: Skilled at manipulating battle from the outskirts, Grimstroke studies every movement and assesses each line, deciding when to emerge from inky darkness to disable his victims and bind them together with a swipe of his brush. He delights in unleashing phantom thralls to vex opponents, as he carefully considers how to dispatch multiple enemies with one fateful stroke.
FrontPage_Debut_Armadillo_Desc: Eager to dash into danger at a moment's notice, the Pangolier thrives on disrupting enemy movements and placing himself in the midst of chaos. Artfully guiding his blade between cracks in armor and shrugging off attacks with his protective scales, this graceful swordsman is always ready to roll into battle.

DOTA_SplashAd_WinterMajorBattlePass_Adde: The third Treasure for the Winter Battle Pass has been released.  Available only to owners of this season's Battle Pass, it includes 7 sets including the Ultra Rare 'Secrets of the Merqueen', a new set for Death Prophet.

The third Treasure for the Winter Battle Pass has been released.  This Treasure includes 7 sets including the Ultra Rare 'Secrets of the Merqueen', a new set for Death Prophet.  If you had previously earned this Treasure, it is now unlocked in your Armory.
Winter Treasure IV Released & Compendium Additions

The final Treasure for the Winter Battle Pass has arrived. Available only to owners of the Winter Battle Pass, it contains seven hero sets, including the Ultra Rare Darkclaw Emissary set for Dazzle.  Additionally, the Shanghai Major Compendium has been updated with Team information as well as Predictions.  Earn Battle Points by correctly predicting different outcomes of the Shanghai Major!

The final Treasure for the Winter Battle Pass has arrived. Inside are seven hero sets, including the Ultra Rare Darkclaw Emissary set for Dazzle.  If you had previously earned this Treasure, it is now unlocked in your Armory.  Additionally, the Shanghai Major Compendium has been updated with Team information as well as Predictions.  Earn Battle Points by correctly predicting different outcomes of the Shanghai Major!

DOTA_SeasonPass_Bounties_OverallDesc:
Having trouble with an enemy in your lane? Redeem a Bounty Token in-game to place a bounty on them.

If a teammate kills that hero while the bounty is active, they'll earn {d:bounty_battle_points} Battle Points and one of your Bounty Tokens will be consumed. If no one claims the bounty in time, your Token won't be spent.
DOTA_Compendium_Bounties_HowTo1: Each week you'll receive an allowance of {i:max_bounties} Tokens to place bounties in your games. Unspent Tokens will not roll over to the following week's balance, so make sure to use them!
DOTA_Compendium_Bounties_HowTo2: Redeem a Bounty Token by targeting an enemy in-game. Your teammates will have five minutes to complete the bounty and reap the rewards.
DOTA_Compendium_Bounties_HowTo3: Gain Battle points yourself by claiming bounties set by your teammates. It's the very definition of win-win.

DOTA_TI8_EventGame_Description:
Deep below the confines of Roshan's infamous pit, a wheel of the world's rarest cheese—Roshefort—slowly comes of age. Driven into a ravenous frenzy by just a whiff of the ripening Roshefort, Roshan has descended into the labyrinth in search of this bimillennial repast.

Now it's time to journey into the Underhollow yourself to risk Roshan's wrath and battle through an eight-team dungeon clash filled with monsters, traps, and more. Navigate the treacherous caverns with your team to earn the Gold and XP needed to destroy your opponents—you'll have to step carefully and work together for any chance to be the last team standing.

For those able to outlast their enemies, or bold enough to claim the Roshefort wheel, an influx of Battle Points awaits.
DOTA_TI8_EventGame_ShortDescription: Battle through an eight-team dungeon clash and fight to be the last ones standing! Slay monstrous hordes, sidestep cunning traps, and destroy your opponents—all for a chance to earn Battle Points.

DOTA_International2020_DraftTrivia_Descr:
Each day we'll select one recently-played community match that all Battle Pass owners can see and vote on.

Use your Dota knowledge to determine which team would win based off heroes, lane assignments, and skill bracket.

Guess correctly multiple times to start a streak and work your way up to earning achievements and Battle Points.

We'll reveal the winner the following day, as well as the overall prediction success rate.

DOTA_DB_CustomGame_Intro:
For millennia, Selemene's chosen have guarded against the advent of a Dark Moon. But as first night of the new moon falls, Nightsilver's champions have been cursed into arcane slumber, rendered helpless behind the temple walls.

With Selemene's influence at its weakest, and twisted shades of the familiar creeping across her domain, the Moon Goddess beckons five new protectors to stand together against the corruption of the Dark Moon Horde.
