DOTA_Compendium_Wagering_TeamBonusTokens:
As you increase your Battle Level, you'll also earn Battle Point Tributes that let you add bonus winnings to the wagers of everyone on your team. Available in 100%, 200%, or 300% bonus amounts.

These tributes are single-use and do not replenish each week.
DOTA_Compendium_MainPage_Wagering_Info_S: Wager tokens to win Battle Points!
DOTA_Compendium_MainPage_Wagering_Info:
Place up to three Wager Tokens on the victory line before a match. Back up your wager by smashing the Ancient and earn 75 Battle Points per token risked. Rack up a win streak with your wagers and you can bump your winnings by 25%, 50%, or 75%.

You'll have ten tokens each week, and can increase that amount at higher Battle Levels.

Raising your level also grants three tiers of Battle Point Tributes that let you add a 100%, 200%, or 300% bonus to the wagers of everyone on your team.

Battle Point Tributes are single-use and do not replenish each week.
DOTA_Compendium_MainPage_ProPred_Info_Sh: Predict the outcome of Pro Circuit Matches to earn extra points towards your Battle Level.
DOTA_Compendium_Wagering_TokensOver: All Tokens have been distributed for this Battle Pass
DOTA_Compendium_Wagering_TokensPopup:
To mark the coming end of the Winter 2016 Battle Pass everyone has had their Wagering Tokens refreshed to 2000 tokens. Make the most of your time remaining and wager big to win big!

The Battle Pass expires on March 30th, 2016
DOTA_Manila_Major_Popup:
Tickets for The Manila Major—the third and final Major this season in advance of The International 2016 are on sale now.

This Major will be produced by PGL, with the main event to take place June 7 – 12 in the Mall of Asia Arena in Manila, Philippines.

Get your tickets today!

DOTA_Compendium_Wagering_HowTo3: Achieve victory to double your wagered amount as Battle Points.
DOTA_Compendium_Wagering_HowTo4: Each Token won converts to one Battle Point.

DOTA_ConductScorecard_Gameplay_Info:
ゲームプレイの通報には、味方からの「ゲームプレイの妨害」や「チート行為、MMRの乱用」の報告があります。これらの通報を受けた場合、行動スコアが減少することがあります。

もし15試合で、約95％のプレイヤーよりも多く通報された場合、あなたは「低優先度」となります。 低優先度では、プレイヤーはマッチメイキングが時間的に禁止され、マッチメイキングプールに戻るためにはシングルドラフトの試合に何度か勝利する必要があります。

敵からの「チート行為、MMRの乱用」の報告、あなたの行動スコアに影響せず、低優先度のペナルティは課されません。
DOTA_ConductScorecard_Comms_Info:
コミュニケーションの悪用の通報は、味方と敵の両方が含まれます。 ゲーム内で相手とコミュニケーションをとっていない場合は、この通報を受けることはありません。

コミュニケーションの悪用の通報は、15試合中記録され。 約95％のプレイヤーよりも多く通報された場合、コミュニケーション禁止措置がとられ、チャットが使用できなくなります。また、通報されるたびに、行動スコアが減少することがあります。
DOTA_ConductScorecard_Behavior_Info: 行動スコアは、あなたのゲームでの行いを表します。 通報されずにゲームをプレイすると、行動スコアが上がります。
DOTA_ConductScorecard_CommsWarning_Info:
Communication Warnings are issued when you you receive more reports than approximately 95% of the player population. If you continue to be reported, a ban will be issued and players will be unable to see your chat without first un-muting you. In addition, each report may result in the reduction of your behavior score. Communications reports includes reports from both allies and enemies. You can not be reported for communications abuse by someone if you have not communicated with that person in game.

Communications Abuse reports accumulate over a period of 15 games.

DOTA_DB_SeasonPass_ChangeQuest: You can change your Path at any time.
DOTA_DB_SeasonPass_QuestIntroLore: 'All things must end if there is to be a new beginning. This wearisome war a stubborn gatekeeper denying what solace the Self seeks. Fulfill these instructions and be rewarded for your allegiance.'
DOTA_DB_SeasonPass_Underlord:
When at last the beast was rent in two, the Three began to falter. The horde was gone, Quath's people lived still, and the power of the Aldwyn Scrolls was extinguished.

The heroes of Quath had saved the city from the abyssal invaders, but little else was certain. With Stonehall in ruins and its War Council scattered or dead, the guiding leash on the Legions had been severed. Soon other Legion Commanders would lay claim to territory, titles—even crowns—and start settling old scores.

But with the influx of Stonehall's survivors, and the handful of ex-legion amongst them, perhaps the Quathan Elders could truly reform the ancient Guard, a new generation of warriors to follow in the steps of three Initiates who had sacrificed the philosopher's path to defend their homeland.

As for Legion Commander Tresdin, that was the last Quath would see of her. She rode out the south gate at dawn, a small band of troops trailing her banners. She would take no part in politics or mortal wars. She had been awakened to the true battle, one waged by larger powers for higher stakes. Though she did not know her destination, the horde commander had betrayed his master — Tresdin finally had a name to seek: Vrogros the Underlord

DOTA_CompendiumRecap_OverviewFormatDetai: Seeding Stage: 4 groups of 4 teams. Top 2 of each go to Upper Bracket.
DOTA_MoviePurchaseCompendium: Purchase the Fall Major Battle Pass to have access to all three episodes of True Sight!
DOTA_CompendiumRecap_Story1Body:
In November 2015, sixteen of the world's best teams competed in the Frankfurt Major, the first Valve Major event held outside of The International, for a total prize pool of $3,000,000.  Eight teams received direct invites to the event—seven of the top eight teams from The International 2015, and Vega Squadron, who had just come from a convincing first place finish at ESL One New York in which they took down the daunting trio of EG, Secret, and IG.


Another eight teams punched their tickets by advancing through the Regional Qualifiers, most notably team Monkey Business (later renamed to OG) securing first place in the European Qualifiers, and Team Unknown finishing second in the Americas Qualifier after surviving the Open qualifiers, where over 500 teams competed for a single spot.

From the start of the group stage, The International 2015 Champions EG had little difficulty topping their group, with fan favorites Team Secret and Vici Gaming following suit. Less expected, Team Mineski from South East Asia scored a clutch victory over EHOME, earning them a second-place finish in their group and a seed in the upper bracket of the playoffs.

Once in the main event, the four favorites—EG, Secret, VG, and CDEC—advanced easily to the Upper Bracket Semifinals, where the two western teams would eventually eliminate their Chinese counterparts to set up a much-anticipated EG vs. Secret Upper Bracket Finals. Down in the lower bracket, EHOME and OG—two teams surprised to find themselves one series from elimination—soared through their matches until meeting each other in Round 5 of the lower bracket matches. Despite a very even match, OG managed to take the series 2-1. With that victory as a springboard, OG had all the confidence needed to best EG, who had lost their series against Secret, and project themselves into the Grand Finals, ultimately being crowned Frankfurt Major Champions after a convincing 3-1 victory over the mighty Team Secret.
DOTA_CompendiumRecap_Story2Body:
After The Frankfurt Major, the competition didn't stop. Just one week after the confetti fell, teams were competing at the LAN finals of Dreamleague Season 3, where OG showed their Frankfurt victory was no fluke, taking the top spot again by defeating a renovated Team Empire, who in turn would proceed to take first place at Dreamhack Moscow only weeks later.

In December, we saw the final competitive matches of the 6.85 patch, with Team Liquid quickly declaring themselves a team to watch by taking top honors in The Defense Season 5. Also not to be forgotten, TI5 champions Evil Geniuses took the gold in the always-entertaining fourth version of The Summit, finishing just below a solid Virtus.Pro squad.

Ringing in the new year was a new patch, bringing new winners and new losers along with it. Fans who enjoyed The International 2013 will be excited to hear that Alliance is back—not only back to the roster that won it all at Benaroya Hall, but also back to the winner's podium. After taking consecutive championships at World Cyber Arena and Starladder I-League, netting almost $500,000 in the process, Alliance is not a team to be ignored or forgotten.

The stage is set in Shanghai for an amazing tournament. Every team dreams of joining OG in the elite club of Major winners, but only one can make that dream a reality. That is, unless OG manage to prove the throne is theirs alone to occupy.
DOTA_CompendiumRecap_Story3Body:
The 6.85 patch was released on September 24, 2015, and shaped the meta for the following 83 days into a highly teamfight-oriented playstyle, favoring early-game carries and semi-carries as well as BKB-piercing teamfight heroes. The Frankfurt Major, played on this patch, featured Tusk (56.6%) and Winter Wyvern (49.5%) as the most-picked heroes, while Doom (72.7%) was by far the most-banned hero of the tournament. Keeping with the concept of strong teamfighting, the most successful heroes with more than 20 games in the tournament were Earthshaker (17-11) and Undying (18-12), with a special mention to Bounty Hunter, who won 9 of the 12 matches in which he was picked.

Patch 6.86 arrived on December 16th, adding the new hero Arc Warden to public games, and adding Earth Spirit, Terrorblade, and Oracle to competitive play. With the introduction of new items like Aether Lens and Faerie Fire, multiple hero revamps, as well as new mechanics that make it more difficult for most heroes to flash-farm stacked camps, different heroes have come to the forefront of the meta game—Invoker and Gyrocopter being two heroes frequently picked or banned. The addition of two jungle camps revitalized jungling heroes, putting Chen and Enchantress as the respective #1 and #3 heroes with the highest win rate of those with over 50 games played.

With early pressure heroes like Zeus and Death Prophet making appearances, split-pushers like Nature's Prophet abundantly featuring in the most-picked category, and late game powerhouses like Spectre and Sven finding new life as some of the most successful heroes, it is fair to say the meta game has not yet settled, and we will surely find lots of surprising developments this March at the Shanghai Major.

DOTA_Spring2016_QuestIntroLore: They poured from the crumbling garrison upon the hillside, a horde of foul creatures crashing against the towering walls of Quath. Not one in twenty cleared the gate's descent, but to defeat so few took bitter toll. Surrounded still by greater horrors, the Elders seek salvation in the rituals of the Aldwyn Scrolls.
DOTA_Fall2016_QuestIntroLore: Disrupt your enemy's battle plans to make them fear the fog on the Path of the Saboteur. Control the map and guide the flow of battle to ensure your team's rapid rise on the Path of the Protector. Gather increasing items of mythic power to spearhead the final thrust on the Path of the Dominator.
DOTA_Winter2017_QuestIntroLore: Disrupt your enemy's battle plans to make them fear the fog on the Path of the Inquisitor. Control the map and guide the flow of battle to ensure your team's rapid rise on the Path of the Paragon. Gather increasing items of mythic power to spearhead the final thrust on the Path of the Skirmisher.
DOTA_Spring2016_Community_Challenge_Intr: Throughout the duration of the Battle Pass, a series of Community Quests will be available to all pass owners. Completing the challenge objectives in your winning matches will contribute to the community progress bar.
DOTA_Spring2016_Community_Challenge_Rewa: Every time the community collectively accomplishes enough challenges to fill the bar, all Battle Pass owners will receive three fireballs to drop in Lina's Battle Blaze. Each fireball offers the chance to win bonus Battle Points to help get cooking on your Level Rewards.
DOTA_Spring2016_Community_Challenge_HowT: Once a community challenge has been collectively accomplished, select where you want to drop your fireballs in Lina's Battle Blaze to earn bonus Battle Points and get cooking on your Level Rewards.
DOTA_International2017_QuestIntroLore: Disrupt your enemy's plans and guide the flow of battle on the Path of the Navigator. Gather increasing items of mythic power to crush all who stand against you on the Path of the Wavebreaker. Assemble your allies to control the map and strike fear into your enemies on the Path of the Rising Tide.
DOTA_Spring2016_PachinkoInferno_BallsRem: You have {d:lina_plays_available} fireball to drop#|#You have {d:lina_plays_available} fireballs to drop
DOTA_International2017_WeeklyGame_HowToP:
Select a starting point for the bubble, and see where it ends up!

Every week, 10 players will win the incredibly rare Sunken Relic!
Play three matches this week to earn a go at Slark's Riptide Rumble and a chance at the extremely rare International 2017 Sunken Relic emblem effect.

By playing three matches this week, you've earned a try at Slark's Riptide Rumble and a chance at the extremely rare International 2017 Sunken Relic emblem effect. Come back at the end of the week to play!
By playing three matches last week, you've earned a try at Slark's Riptide Rumble and a chance at the extremely rare International 2017 Sunken Relic emblem effect. Play now!
DOTA_ArcanaVote_IntroTextTitle: Join the community in deciding which hero will receive the next Arcana.
DOTA_ArcanaVote_IntroText01: Each week, a selection of heroes will compete in head-to-head elimination runoffs to determine who advances to the next round. The hero that survives undefeated will be selected for an Arcana set. Click on the hero icons to mark your choices, then press the Submit Votes button to cast your ballot.
DOTA_ArcanaVote_IntroText02: Every Battle Pass owner receives sixteen votes per week that can be distributed however you like—use your votes on multiple matchups or stuff the ballot on a single one. Your voice, your choice. Unused votes do not roll over to the following week, so make sure to visit the polls regularly.
DOTA_ArcanaVote_IntroText03: Players who reach Battle Level {d:reward_level_1} will receive an additional sixteen votes for a weekly total of 32, and Battle Level {d:reward_level_2} will raise that limit to 48. After the final count is tallied, the winner of the final matchup will be announced at {g:dota_event_league_name:eventid}.

Group Stage: Two best-of-two groups of eight teams. Top four teams in each group advance to Upper Bracket, bottom four advance to Lower Bracket.
Main Event: 16 teams in best-of-three double elimination playoff. Lower bracket first round is best-of-one, Grand Finals are best-of-five.

DOTA_Home_BattlePass_DoubleDown_InfoIcon:
Double down on how much MMR you're willing to put on the line!

At the start of a Ranked match, you'll have the option to double your potential MMR loss or gain.

Higher Battle Pass Levels award more weekly Tokens.

DOTA_TI7_SplashAd_EventEndReminder: The International is nearly upon us, and the ability to purchase Battle Pass Levels and the Collector's Cache will end soon after the Grand Finals conclude on August 12th, 2017. This will be the last opportunity to acquire these exclusive items that will not be tradable or purchasable on the marketplace.
DOTA_TI8_SplashAd_EventEndReminder:
The International is nearly upon us, and the ability to purchase Battle Pass Levels and both Collector's Caches will end soon after the Grand Finals conclude on August 25th, 2018. This will be the last opportunity to acquire exclusive items that will not be tradable or purchasable on the marketplace. 

These items include the Custom Terrain, Custom Creeps, Prestige Item, Collector's Aegis, Baby Roshan, and the Collector's Cache treasures.
DOTA_International2017_Champions_Body: Team Liquid performs the first-ever Grand Finals sweep in The International's history.

DOTA_Play_Turbo_Title: A game of Dota in half the time
DOTA_Play_Turbo_Text: More gold & XP, streamlined couriers; weaker towers and a quicker play time.
DOTA_Play_AbilityDraft_Text: Reworked draft screen and fifteen heroes added.
DOTA_GameMode_AbilityDraft_ChangeLog_Too: アビリティドラフトの最近のアップデートを表示します
DOTA_GameMode_AbilityDraft_ChangeLog_Lat:
October 7, 2022
• Fixed Wukong's Command only being castable once.
• Replaced Soul Catcher with Disseminate for Shadow Demon.
• Scepter on Drunken Brawler now grants Primal Companion, toggle auto-cast to switch to Primal Companion. Brewlings level is equal to the level of the drafted ultimate.
• Scepter on Ensare now grants Reel In, toggle auto-cast to switch to the Reel In ability.
• Scepter on Primal Roar now grants Drums of Slom.
• Scepter on Stampede now grants Hitch a Ride.
• Scepter on Laguna Blade now grants Flame Cloak.
• Scepter on Viper Strike now grants Nosedive.
• Shard on Enchant now grants Little Friends, toggle auto-cast to switch to the Little Friends ability.
• Shard on Wrath of Nature now grants Curse of the Oldgrowth.
• Shard on Nether Strike now grants Planar Pocket.
• Shard on Ravage now grants Tendrils of the Deep.
• Shard on Poison Nova now grants Latent Toxicity.
• Fixed a number of talents that were missing since the 7.32 patch.
   NOTE: For Luna's right side lvl20 talent, both Moon Glaives & Lucent Beam must be drafted.

June 8, 2022
• Strategy Map & Starting Items now visible during Strategy Time.
• Draft order is random again for parties in match-made games, they are no longer grouped.
• Updated Invoker ability values to closer match gameplay patch 7.31.
• Scepter on Rupture now grants Blood Mist.
• Scepter on False Promise now grants Rain of Destiny.
• Shard on Mystic Flare now grants Shield of the Scion.
• Shard on Rearm now grants Warp Flare.
• Shard on Demonic Purge now grants Demonic Cleanse.
• Fixed cosmetic items only displaying for the local player during VS screen.
• Fixed Gobble Up sometimes not being castable for the whole game.
• Fixed Vengeance Aura illusion spawning with 0 Shadow Raze charges.
• Fixed Vengeance Aura illusion having infinite Unleash attacks.
• Fixed Spirit Bear not dying when the player dies without Scepter.
• Fixed Burning Barrage being cancelled if a target was hit by Greater Bash.
• Fixed Timelock not working on ranged heroes if attack speed too high. (i.e. Focus Fire)
• Added particle effects for Starbreaker ability when not Dawnbreaker.
• Fixed Metamorphosis demon model size being too small.
• Fixed Essense Flux mana not transferring through Tether.
• Fixed passive abilities triggering Fiery Soul. (i.e. Moon Glaives)
• Level 25 passive Talent for Brewmaster will only show if both Drunken Brawler and Primal Split are drafted.
• Fixed Heavenly Jump Talent missing when drafted.
• Fixed Voodoo Restoration Talent missing when drafted.
• Fixed Luminosity Talent missing when drafted.
• Fixed some cases of non-drafted spells showing up on the Aghanim's tooltip.
• Fixed some cases of Aghanim's granted hotkey order being broken.
• Removed panel that covered part of the draft when coaching.

March 2, 2022
• Fixed Wukong's Command damage from Scepter created units doing too much damage.
• Fixed Good Juju showing up as draftable ultimate, it is now granted with Bad Juju.
• Added Heavenly Jump as draftable ability.
• Updated Techies draftable abilities to match 7.31 patch.

November 8, 2021
• Shuffling player slots is now a lobby option for custom lobbies and works on hosted servers. Default is on.
• Wukong's Command now grants Mischief. Only Monkey King can turn into trees.
• Call of the Wild now defaults to Hawk. Boar can still be accessed by toggling auto-cast.
• A number of previously unavailable Scepter/Shard abilities are now granted, abilities are accessed by toggling auto-cast on the base spell:
   → Tree Volley granted with Tree Grab
   → Torrent Storm granted with Torrent
   → Terror Wave granted with Metamorphosis
   → Death Seeker granted with Death Pulse
   → Cold Blooded granted with Mystic Snake (Cold Blooded passive ability is hidden)
   → Hairball granted with Quill Spray (Nasal Goo must be drafted to get Goo portion of Hairball)
• Fixed Talent bug with Winter Wyvern and Wind Ranger.

最近のアップデート
• Poofが範囲2000以内の任意の味方ユニットにキャスト可能。
• Vengeance Auraによって生成された強力なイリュージョンによるJuxtaposeはヒーローからの分身確率が適用される。
• Sinister Gaze with Scepter will stop channeling if another channeled ability is used.
• Fixed another bug with Tree Dance being in the wrong slot if stunned while Primal Spring in use.
• Fixed Meepo animation digging into the ground when casting certain spells.
• Fixed missing draft screen shard indicator for Overload.

September 1, 2021
• Sinister's Gaze with Scepter now allows non-Lich spells to be cast without breaking channeling.
• Fixed Shadowraze not working as a charge ability.
• Fixed Acorn Shot not working with some melee heroes.
• Fixed Doppelganger killing the strong illusion created by Vengeance Aura Scepter.
• Fixed Keen Conveyance being draftable. When Rearm is drafted, Keen Conveyance is also granted.
• Scepter on Dark Rift now grants Fiend's Gate.
• Shard on Focus Fire now grants Gale Force.
• Scepter on Spawn Spiderlings now grants Spinner's Snare.
• Shard on Walrus Punch no longer grants Frozen Sigil.
• Arcane Orb no longer triggers Mystic Flare Shard effects.
• Fixed talent tree errors for Lina, Earth Spirit & Grimstroke.
DOTA_GameMode_AbilityDraft_ChangeLog:
July 6, 2021
• Added Shadow Demon's Shadow Poison to Ability Draft. See tooltip for details.
• Added Earth Spirit's Geomagnetic Grip to Ability Draft.
• Fixed illusions having the abilities of the casting hero instead of the cloned hero.
• Fixed interaction between Wisp Spirits and Vengeance Aura Scepter.
• Eyes in the Forest that have been placed no longer disappearing when hero respawns under Vengeance Aura Scepter.
• Fixed Wukong's Command gold/xp being awarded to original player if players swapped during strategy time.

July 5, 2021
• Shard on SoulBind no longer grants Ink Over.
• Added AD note for Shard on Curse of Avernus.
• Fixed Tree Dance/Primal Spring ability slot issue introduced in last patch when manually stopping channel.

July 2, 2021
• Scepter on Sharp Shooter now grants Hunter's Boomerang.
• Shard on Sharp Shooter now grants Decoy (does not require Bushwack for full effect).
• Shard on Spirit Form now grants Recall.
• Shard effects for Skywrath Mage now granted when Mystic Flare drafted.
• Shard on Grow no longer grants Craggy Exterior.
• Shard on Shadow Dance now grants Depth Shroud instead of Fish Bait.
• Shard on Battle Trance now grants Rampage.
• Fixed Scepter granted spells (Wolf Bite, Eyes in Forest, etc.) not being castable while dead under Vengeance Aura Scepter.
• Reverse Timewalk now replaces Timewalk ability slot while it is castable.
• Fixed Fireball initially not being granted if Shard was aquired outside of Dragon Form.
• Fixed Tree Dance/Primal Spring ability slots being broken if the tree was destroyed before Primal Spring completed channeling.
• Shard description on Chaos Meteor now shows up in tooltips.
• Fixed Talent errors for Dawnbreaker, Hoodwink, Shadowfiend, Wraith King, Visage, Rubick, Crystal Maiden & Lich.
• Fixed AD notes on some spells being outdated.

February 16, 2021
• Shadowraze now has 3 charges and has been updated to use mid-range distance.
• Skull Basher now bashes, even if Timelock is drafted.
• Blur Scepter upgrade now increments non-ultimate charge-based abilities by 1 when a kill occurs.
• Fixed Overcharge ending early on owning hero if tether was owned by a teammate and broken.
• Added custom effects for when Tree Grab used.
• Fixed Io's model disappearing if Tree Grab was used.
• Fixed Hero switching back to default model if Tree Grab used while in different form (Dragon Form, Metamorphosis, Flesh Golem etc.)
• Increased talent tree bonus gold:
   150→300
   250→500
   500→750
   750→1250

January 13, 2021
• Fixed Take Aim active not providing bonus range to melee units.
• Fixed Liquid Fire sometimes not working when drafted on Lich.
• Fixed Poison Sting not applying to Plague Wards when both drafted.
• Fixed Spirit Bear not counting as being owned when picked by Lone Druid.

January 11, 2021
• Added Change Log to draft screen.
• Fixed a crash when Stone Form used on Visage Familiars.

January 9, 2021
• Fixed some drafts never ending, or ending too soon.
• Fixed Echo Stomp not working if Astral Spirit not drafted.

January 7, 2021
• Fixed Greater Bash not working when drafted.
• Fixed Io Spirits In/Out ability replacing other drafted abilities. This should fix any 0 second cool-down exploits with other abilities.
• Fixed Fire Spirits not working with Shard.
• Fixed being unable to cast Reverse Timewalk with Timewalk Shard.
• Fixed Holy Persuasion not converting ancient creeps with Scepter.
• Fixed Grave Keeper's Cloak not working with Shard.
• Fixed Epicenter not getting the Shard upgrade.
• Fixed Fissure Shard upgrade not working.
• Pulse Nova Scepter upgrade now grants Nihilism.
• Mana Void Scepter upgrade now grants Blink Fragment.
• Macropyre Shard upgrade now grants Liquid Ice.
• Fixed Spirit Form not granting Recall and Blinding Light when active.
• Fixed heroes getting Spirit Form if Illuminate was drafted and a Scepter was gained.
• Fixed Ransack not getting the Geostrike upgrade with Shard.
• Summon Familiars Scepter upgrade now grants Silent as the Grave.
• Skeleton archers now have a minimum attack range of 500 even when Burning Army is cast by melee heroes.
• Take Aim and the Shadow Realm active now provide bonus range to melee heroes.
• Spirit Bear now displays on the left side of the screen as an owned unit as well as in the post-game scoreboard. It's inventory will also be included in the net worth calculations of the owner hero.
• Swashbuckle now splinters the attacks if Marksmanship is drafted and Scepter is active.
• Poison Sting now only applies to the primary target when used with multi-target attacks.
• Poison Sting no longer applies to attacks coming from any wards other than Plague Wards (Serpent Wards, Death Ward)
• Fixed Infernal Blade applying damage and burn to buildings if you switch targets before the projectile lands.
• Stifling Dagger now applies Infernal Blade if it is set to auto-cast.
• Fixed Bash of the Deep triggering multiple times when ranged units had high attack speed.
• Fixed Sacred Arrow launching from different positions depending on the hero. Will now always launch from center point of the hero.
• Fixed Acorn Shot missing bounce targets for melee heroes.
• Fixed Echo Stomp doing double the damage if Astral Spirit was also drafted. Note: Echo Stomp will still do both physical and magical damage values regardless of Astral Spirit being drafted.
• Fixed some heroes getting stuck in looping animations (Ember Spirit, Magnus, Pangolier, Void Spirit).
• Fixed giving Scepters to teammates (with Greevil's greed) removing your Shard granted ability.
• Fixed attack abilities with a cost, spending that cost on multi-target attacks that don't proc modifiers (Split Shot, Flak Cannon).
• Fixed Lil' Shredder stacks being consumed too quickly when using Medusa's Split Shot.
• Fixed Bash of the Deep counting up from Marksmanship Splintered attacks.
• Fixed Walrus Punch FX sometimes getting stuck on targets for the duration of the game.
• Fixed Duel ending early if Berserker's Call was on the target.
• Fixed Invoker & Hoodwink not getting access to the talents when they drafted their own spells.
• Fixed talents missing from Wraith King, Omniknight & Beastmaster.
• Fixed being unable to click anything for the first few seconds of the game.
• Fixed Coaches crashing during drafting stage.
• Fixed private lobbies crashing after the draft if there wasn't 10 players.
• Fixed various inaccurate scepter/shard markers on draft screen as well as missing or wrong Aghanim's tooltips.

DOTA_HeroRelics_HoldAltForStats: Altキーを押すと統計が確認できます
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_Title: レリックでヒーローの統計を追跡しよう
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_Description: Dota Plus会員はヒーローレリックによりヒーローの追加統計を追跡することができます。各ヒーローにはユニークなレリックセットがあり、レリックを獲得するとすぐに統計の記録が開始されます。
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_LevelUpTitle: レリックをレベルアップしてヒーローの経験値を稼ごう
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_LevelUpDescription: 各レリックは統計が特定の値に到達する度にレベルアップします。例えば、キルアシストレリックは{d:assists_per_relic_level}アシストするごとにレベルアップします。レベルアップするたびにヒーローXPを獲得し、ヒーローレベルが上がっていきます。
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_TwoTypes: レリックの2つのタイプ
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_HowToObtain_Descri: Dota Plus会員はシャードを使ってヒーローレリックを購入することが出来ます。購入できるレリックは2タイプあります:
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_HowToObtain_Normal:
{g:dota_shards_value:random_common_relic_price}でランダムなコモンレリックを購入できる。
1レベルごとに{d:common_relic_hero_xp_per_level} XP獲得。
DOTA_HeroRelics_About_HowToObtain_Rare_D:
{g:dota_shards_value:random_rare_relic_price}でランダムなレアレリックを購入できる。
1レベルごとに{d:rare_relic_hero_xp_per_level} XP獲得。

DOTA_Party_CustomGame_Cooldown_Body: 現在パーティーメンバーが、カスタムゲームのプレイを制限されています。

DOTA_Party_CustomGame_Few_Games_Body: All members of the party with Limited User Accounts need to have played at least {s:num_games} Dota games to play Custom Games.
DOTA_HUD_PlusHeroChallengeHelp:
マッチングした試合で選んだチャレンジをクリアすることで、ヒーローバッジをレベルアップさせるためのXPを獲得する事ができます。

チャレンジは2週間で終了します。更新して新しいチャレンジを受けましょう。

DOTA_HUD_PlusHeroLockInRefresh: 新しいチャレンジでロックする
DOTA_TalentPickRate_Help_Tooltip: ピック率はタレント名の後ろの灰色のバーで表示されます。右側のパーセンテージは、そのタレントを選んだ時の勝率の高さを示しています。
DOTA_LastUpdated_Help_Tooltip: タレントの統計とキル/デス/アシスト、純資産、ラストヒット/ディナイの平均は最終更新日の前4日間の試合から算出されています。
DOTA_KillGraph_DamageExplanation:
Physical damage is caused by attacks and some abilities. Reduced by Armor.

Magical damage is caused by abilities and items. Reduced by Magic Resistance.

Pure damage is caused by a few abilities. Pure damage is not reduced.
DOTA_Plus_Death_Screen_DamageByType: タイプごとのダメージ
DOTA_Plus_Death_Screen_DamageByHero: ヒーローごとのダメージ
DOTA_Plus_PurchaseDialog_DetailText: Dota PlusであなたのDotaライフをもっと充実させましょう。Dota Plusは、あなたの実績を追跡しながらお気に入りのヒーローの限界を押し広げ、スキルを向上させるための豊富な知識を収集して、絶えず進化しているメタゲームに対応するための最新情報を提供します。
DOTA_Plus_PurchaseDialog_Title_Subscribe: あなたのサブスクリプション
DOTA_Plus_PurchaseDialog_DetailText_Subs: サブスクリプション有効期限: {T:s:plus_subscription_end_date}
あなたのサブスクリプションは{d:plus_subscription_duration_months}ヶ月更新で、{T:s:plus_subscription_end_date}に{s:plus_subscription_renew_price}で更新されます。

DOTA_PlusStore_ChatWheelRewardSubtitle: チャットホーイルはDota Plus会員である限りアンロックされ続けます。
DOTA_PlusStore_PlusRequired_Title: Dota Plusのメンバーシップが必要です。
DOTA_PlusStore_PlusRequired_Message: このアイテムを購入するためにはDota Plus会員になる必要があります。
DOTA_PurchaseRandomRelic_Description: Spend {g:dota_event_points_value:random_relic_purchase_shards} to purchase a random hero relic for {g:dota_hero_name:hero_id}. If you already own the relic you receive, it will automatically be recycled. Common relics recycle for {g:dota_event_points_value:relic_recycle_shards}, and rare relics recycle for {g:dota_event_points_value:rare_relic_recycle_shards}.
DOTA_PurchaseRandomRelic_CommonDescripti: {g:dota_event_points_value:random_relic_purchase_shards}でまだ持っていない{g:dota_hero_name:hero_id}のコモンレリックをランダムに購入します。
DOTA_PurchaseRandomRelic_RareDescription: {g:dota_event_points_value:random_relic_purchase_shards}でまだ持っていない{g:dota_hero_name:hero_id}のレアレリックをランダムに購入します。
DOTA_PurchaseRandomRelic_NewRelic: 新しいレリックを獲得
DOTA_PurchaseRandomRelic_DuplicateRelic: 重複したレリックを獲得
DOTA_PurchaseRandomRelic_AllPurchased: すべてのレリックを獲得済み
DOTA_PlusRewards_HeroChatWheel: ヒーローチャットホイール
DOTA_PlusRewards_HeroProgressionRewards: ヒーロープログレッションリワード
DOTA_Plus_Challenge_Expiration: Challenges will expire after two weeks.  Refresh to receive new challenges after the time expires.
DOTA_Plus_HeroBadgeInfo: Dota Plusが有効でない場合、レベル6以上のレベリングはできません。Dota Plusのサブスクリプションを再開すると、停止していたレベルから再開されます。
DOTA_Plus_HighestLevelHeroes: レベルの高いヒーロー
DOTA_Plus_HighestRelics: レベルの高いレリック
DOTA_PlusPurchase_HeroProgression: 高度なヒーロープログレッション
DOTA_PlusPurchase_HeroProgression_Descri: 様々なヒーローで、1人か2人で何百試合プレイしても、ゲームごとにヒーローのレベルアップに必要なXPを獲得できます。Dota Plusでは、ヒーローのレベルを30まで上げることができます！
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Assistant_Description: 数百万回の試合で得られたデータをもとに、リアルタイムでアイテムやアビリティの提案がなされ、最新のトレンドを知ることができます。
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Rewards_Description: シャードを貯めて使うことで、様々な限定特典をゲットできます。
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Perks_Description: さらに特典として、毎週開催されるバトルカップへの無料参加、季節限定の地形、シャードが獲得できるシーズンクエストなどが用意されています！
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Guilds_Description: ギルドには誰でも参加できますが、Dota Plus加入者だけが、同じ志を持ったプレイヤーのコミュニティを作成することができ、勝利への道を歩むために、常に適切なチームを後ろ盾にすることができます。協力してギルドポイントやウィークリーリワードを獲得しましょう。また、ギルドメンバーになると、追加のコントラクトスロットを使用することができます。
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_HeroLeveling: 高度なヒーローレベリング
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_HeroRelics: 統計を追跡するヒーローレリック
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_HeroChallenges: ヒーロー特有のチャレンジ
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_ItemSuggestion: アイテムとアビリティの提案
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_HeroPickSugges: ヒーローピックの提案
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_ComparativeTra: リアルタイム試合分析
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_WinProbability: 観戦者への勝敗の確率
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_StackPullTimer: スタック&プルタイマー
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_RolesGrid: ヒーローのロールグリッド
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_HeroChatWheel: ヒーローチャットホイール
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_LegacyHeroSets: レガシーヒーローセット
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_BattleCup: ウィークリーバトルカップへの招待
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_Tipping: ゲーム内のアドバイス
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_WeeklyVictoryS: ウィークリー勝利シャード報酬
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_DpcApp: Dota Pro Circuitモバイルアプリ
DOTA_PlusNewFeature_ExclusiveSets_Jan201: New sets for Monkey King, Medusa, Enchantress, and Centaur. Available for purchase exclusively to Plus subscribers in the Plus Rewards store.
DOTA_PlusNewFeature_SeasonalQuests_Desc: Dota Plus subscribers now have access to a brand new set of quests to complete over the duration of Ranked Season 3.
DOTA_PlusPurchase_Feature_ChatWheelSound: チャットホイールサウンド
DOTA_PlusPostGame_LevelRestricted: レベリングするためにDota Plusに入会する。
DOTA_PlusPostGame_CavernCrawlProgress: カーバンクロールプログレス
DOTA_PlusPostGame_FeaturedGameMode: ウィークエンドスポットライト
DOTA_PostGame_WraithKingArcanaProgress: Wraith King アルカナプログレス
DOTA_HeroBadgeProgressTurboLimitedGains: ターボでは星1つしか獲得できません。
DOTA_BattlePassPostGame_Progress: バトルパスプログレス
DOTA_BattlePassPostGame_WeeklyChallengeC: ウィークリーチャレンジ達成
DOTA_BattlePassPostGame_WeeklyChallengeP: ウィークリーチャレンジ
DOTA_PlusUpsell_HeroLeveling_Description: お気に入りのヒーローをプレイしてレベルを上げよう。ヒーローバッジを自慢したり、新しいチャットホイール、シャードを受け取って報酬を獲得しよう。
DOTA_PlusUpsell_HeroChallenges_Descripti: 2週間ごとに最大3つのチャレンジをクリアしてXPを獲得しましょう。達成度に応じて1～3個のスターを獲得でき、スターが多いほどより多くのXPを受け取ることができます。
DOTA_PlusUpsell_HeroRelics_Description: シャードで全14種類のヒーローレリックを購入して様々な統計を記録に残そう。自分のプロフィールに載せて、みんなに見てもらおう。
DOTA_PlusUpsell_StatComparison_Descripti: 自分のヒーローの平均GPM、XPM、ラストヒット、ディナイを見て、他のランクのプレイヤーと比較することができます。あなたのレベルはどれくらいでしょう？
DOTA_PlusUpsell_TalentPicks_Description: 最も人気のあるタレントのピック率、成功率を見ることができます。そして、様々なランクのプレイヤーと自分の選択を比較することができます。
DOTA_PlusUpsell_HeroStats_Description: このヒーローを味方だった場合と、敵だった場合の勝率を見ることができます。また、ピーク時のファーム、最高ダメージ、回復も見ることができます。
DOTA_PlusUpsell_GlobalTrends_Description: 最新のメタ情報を入手することができます。今最も勝率が高いヒーロー、人気のヒーロー、バンされているヒーローを見ることができます。
DOTA_PlusDebut_Subtitle:
ヒーローのレベル | アシスタント
分析 | プラス特典

DOTA_PlusWelcome_Description: Dota Plusを探索して、クエストをクリアすることで{g:dota_shards_value:total_reward}を獲得しよう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_Subtitle: Dota Plusの機能を学んで最初のシャードを獲得しよう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ClaimFailed: 報酬の受け取りに失敗しました。再度お試しください。(エラーコード: {d:error_code})
DOTA_PlusWelcome_Finished_Title: おめでとうございます
DOTA_PlusWelcome_Finished_Message: あなたはすべてのウェルカムクエストをクリアしました。Dota Plusを楽しんでくださいね！
DOTA_PlusWelcome_Part2Locked: パート1のクエストをすべてクリアするとパート2が解放されます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_Part3Locked: パート2のクエストをすべてクリアするとパート3が解放されます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_QuestsAvailable:p{welco: {d:welcome_quests_available} Welcome Quest Available#|#{d:welcome_quests_available} Welcome Quests Available
DOTA_PlusWelcome_AllQuestsCompleted: すべてのクエストを達成しました！
DOTA_PlusWelcome_SelectPlusGuide_Name: プラスアシスタントガイドを選択する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_SelectPlusGuide_Descrip: 試合中にショップを開いて、ガイドをプラスアシスタントに変更しましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PickSuggestedHero_Name: 敵と味方のおすすめヒーローを選ぶ
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PickSuggestedHero_Descr: ヒーロー選択の際、「味方と敵」がおすすめしたヒーローをピックしてみましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ViewPostGameAnalytics_N: 前のゲームの分析を見る
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ViewPostGameAnalytics_D: 試合終了後、内訳タブで及ぼした影響を分析し、パフォーマンスタブでは自分のランクでの平均値と比較することができます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ViewHeroTrends_Name: ヒーロー別のグローバルランク推移を見る
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ViewHeroTrends_Descript: ヒーローのページのトレンドタブを見ると、ランクごとのプレイヤーのパフォーマンスを見ることができます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_EquipSeasonalTerrain_Na: 季節限定の地形を装備する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_EquipSeasonalTerrain_De: 保管庫から季節の地形を装備しましょう。Dota Plus会員はいつでもその時の季節の地形を利用できます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PurchaseRelic_Name: シャードを使ってレリックを購入する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PurchaseRelic_Descripti: ヒーローレリックをランダムまたはレア購入してみましょう。ヒーローの装備画面またはプラスリワード画面から購入画面にアクセスできます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_UseSpectatorWinProbatil: 観戦者用の勝機グラフを使用する
試合を観戦しているときに、画面左上のボタンから勝機のグラフを見ることができます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_UseDeathSummary_Descrip: 試合中死亡した時や、死亡したプレイヤーを観戦しているときにデスサマリーボタンをクリックすると、そのプレイヤーがどのように死亡したかの詳細な分析結果を見ることができます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_UseHeroChatWheel_Name: ヒーローチャットホイールを使用する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_UseHeroChatWheel_Descri: 試合中、ヒーローチャットホイールを使用することでヒーローにセリフを喋らせることができます。これらのセリフは、ヒーローレベルが上がるとアンロックされていきます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_BuyLegacySet_Name: プラスリワードからレガシーセットを購入する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_BuyLegacySet_Descriptio: シャードショップからレガシーセットをどれか一つ購入してみましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_FollowLaneSuggestor_Nam: レーンアシスタントの提案に従う
DOTA_PlusWelcome_FollowLaneSuggestor_Des: ヒーローをピックした後、プラスアシスタントから提案されたレーンをミニマップ上で選択してみましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PlayBattleCup_Name: バトルカップをプレイする
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PlayBattleCup_Descripti: 週末に開催されるバトルカップに参加してみましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_EarnWeeklyReward_Name: 毎週の勝利報酬を受け取る
DOTA_PlusWelcome_EarnWeeklyReward_Descri: 一週間で3勝すると、ホーム画面のプロフィールの下にあるボタンからシャード報酬を受け取ることができます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_BeatComparativeStat_Nam: 試合開始10分時点で統計目標を超す
DOTA_PlusWelcome_BeatComparativeStat_Des: 試合開始10分時点で、キル/デス/アシスト数、ラストヒット数/ディナイ数、総資産のいずれかであなたのランクの平均値を上回りましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_CompleteAChallenge_Name: チャレンジを1つ達成する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_CompleteAChallenge_Desc: 好きなヒーローのヒーローチャレンジを1つ完了しましょう。チャレンジは試合に勝利した場合にのみカウントされます。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_MakeRelicProgress_Name: レリックプログレスを進める
DOTA_PlusWelcome_MakeRelicProgress_Descr: レリックを購入した後そのヒーローでプレイして、レリックのステータスを上げていきましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ReachHeroLevel_Name: 好きなヒーローをレベル3にする
DOTA_PlusWelcome_ReachHeroLevel_Descript: 試合をプレイして、チャレンジを達成して好きなヒーローをレベル3まで上げましょう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_BecomeDotaPlusMember_De: Dota Plusへようこそ！ボタンをクリックして最初の報酬を受け取ろう。
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PlayRankedRoles_Name: ランクマッチに5回勝利する
DOTA_PlusWelcome_PlayRankedRoles_Descrip: ランクロールマッチで5回勝利しましょう。
DOTA_PlusDBPage_Manage: サブスクリプションの管理
DOTA_QuestsComplete: クエストコンプリート

DOTA_PurchaseItemFromPrompt_Info: 購入したアイテムはトレードや市場に販売することはできません。

DOTA_TI8BP_purchase_pool_contribution_le: 25% of all Battle Pass Level sales go directly to The International 2018 prize pool.

TI2019_BP_Buy_Block_Desc: The Battle Pass is your companion for the biggest Dota event of the year. Raise your Battle Level to unlock increasing rewards, including new Immortal items, exclusive Item Sets and Terrain, a new Hero Persona for Invoker, and more!
TI2019_BP_Buy_Desc: スタンダードパトルパス
DOTA_TI9_BPHOME_MOROKAI_DESC: The Mo'rokai—two mythic beasts of yore dormant for centuries—have been roused from slumber by the encroaching battle of the Ancients.
DOTA_TI9_BPHOME_PERSONA_DESC: Introducing the first-ever Hero Persona, an all-new 'Young' Invoker variant that sends the Arsenal Magus back to his early days studying the wizarding arts.
DOTA_TI9_EventGame_BPDailyBonus: +{d:daily_bonus_bp} Additional Points Per Win with Daily Bonus Active (Max 1 Token Per Day)
DOTA_TI9_EventGame_RefreshTime: Points and Bonus Tokens Refresh in {t:d:t:time_until_reset}
DOTA_TI9_BPHOME_MOROKAI_DESC_BPDB: The Mo'rokai—two mythic beasts of yore dormant for centuries—have been roused from slumber by Dark Willow and the encroaching battle of the Ancients.
DOTA_TI9_MorokaiDescription_Pt1: Deep in the jungles of Fellstrath, the ruins of an ancient civilization lie hidden beneath tangled canopy and creeping vine. But the crumbling facades and flourishing overgrowth aren't the only things lurking there.
DOTA_TI9_MorokaiDescription_Pt2: Deep in the jungles of Fellstrath, the ruins of an ancient civilization lie hidden beneath tangled canopy and creeping vine. Drawn here in search of fabled relics, Dark Willow has opened the way for others to follow. Now the Mo'rokai—two mythic beasts of yore dormant for centuries—have been roused from slumber by those who trespass upon their lands.
DOTA_TI9_MorokaiTeaser1_Desc: The Mo'rokai require fresh tribute to reach full strength. Collect essence from slain enemies to unlock magic of your choosing for your Mo'rokai.
DOTA_TI9_MorokaiTeaser2_Desc: As the Mo'rokai reclaim their powers, they'll join the march upon the enemy Ancient, eager to destroy anything in their way.
DOTA_TI9_MorokaiTeaser3_Desc: Compete to claim treasures around the map containing bonus essence or Battle Points. You'll also score Battle Points for your victories, and unlock an exclusive emoticon at 50 wins.
DOTA_Compendium_MainPage_Tipping_Info_Sh: Tip players in your matches whenever they do something worthy of recognition!
DOTA_TI2019_Home_Tipping_Info:
Tip players in your matches whenever they do something worthy of recognition.

Each tip is worth 25 Battle Points at the start.

You can upgrade your tips along the Battle Pass rewards path to give 50, 100, or 200 Battle Points.

Tipping does not cost your own Battle Points, so try to spend all ten each week.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_JungleExpedition_Text: Venture through hidden jungle ruins on a quest to uncover long-lost secrets.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_Coaching_Text: Put your strategies and leadership skills to the ultimate test—and possibly earn an influx of Battle Points.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_CustomGame_Text: Feed your team's Mo'rokai to unlock special shared abilities that will help destroy the enemy's base in this upcoming game mode.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_PartyFinder_Text: Add fun teammates to your party pool, then invite them all to a match with a single click.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_AvoidPlayers_Text: Designate players to filter out and the matchmaker will avoid placing them on your team.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_ArcanaVote_Text: Do your part to help decide which hero gets the next Arcana.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_Morokai_Title: Wrath of the Mo'rokai - Coming Soon
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_Terrain_Text: Called Fellstrath by the outsiders brave enough to test her borders, the dark wilderness of this custom terrain awaits.
DOTA_TI9_FrontPage_Axe_Text: Lost in a strange land without his precious namesake, Axe is exactly where he wants to be!

DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Terrain_Text: Called Fellstrath by the outsiders brave enough to test her borders, the dark wilderness of this custom terrain awaits.
DOTA_TI10_Guilds_Desc: There's nothing more satisfying than smashing an Ancient with a great group of friends, and then doing the same thing again and again.
DOTA_TI10_DivinePath_Desc: Discover riches untold within the moonlit forest of Nightsilver and the twisted realities of Foulfell.
DOTA_TI10_Immortal_1_Desc: Dig into the first batch of all-new Immortal Treasures—featuring offerings for Lifestealer, Tinker, Night Stalker, and more.
DOTA_TI10_WraithKing_Arcana_Desc: People keep asking me if I'm back. Yeah, I think I'm back.
DOTA_TI10_Gauntlet_Desc: Prove your battle prowess through consistent victory in the all-new Battle Gauntlet, an even more competitive twist on your daily Dota experience.
DOTA_TI10_Cache_Voting_Desc: Vote on your favorite sets to help choose which entries make it into this year's collection.
DOTA_TI10_Immortal_2_Desc: Check out the second Immortal Treasures—featuring offerings for Ursa, Jakiro, Witch Doctor, and more.
DOTA_TI10_Immortal_3_Desc: The wait is over for the final set of Immortal Treasures—featuring offerings for Pugna, Oracle, Lich, and more.

DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_ArcanaVote_Text: Do your part to help decide which hero gets the next Arcana.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Website_Desc: Visit the Battle Pass website for details on all this year's features and rewards.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Immortal1_Desc: Unlock Immortal Treasures through Battle Pass rewards, or purchase more from the store.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Guilds_Desc: Work together to complete contracts and challenges to gain Battle Points and level up your guild.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Gauntlet_Desc: Prove your battle prowess through consistent victory in a daily, competitive challenge.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_DivinePath_Desc: Discover riches untold across two new maps—the moonlit forest of Nightsilver and the twisted realities of Foulfell.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Pings_Desc: Unlock all-new cosmetics for your ping wheel.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Sideshop_Desc: Spend Sideshop Gold earned in the Battle Pass to hire heroes Underlords-style, then sell your hires to unlock special rewards.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Bounties_Desc: Redeem a Bounty Token in-game to place a bounty on an enemy. The teammate who delivers will reap a Battle Pass reward.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Predictions_Desc: Vote each day on who you think won a recently-played community matchup. Go on a streak to earn achievements and Battle Points.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_Gifting_Desc: Gift Battle Passes to your friends to unlock new title cosmetics on your mini profile.
DOTA_TI10_FrontPage_KillStreaks_Desc: Strike fear into your enemies with new Kill Streak effects.

DOTA_UpcomingRewards_TI10_WindrangerArca: Feel the embrace of the elements with an all-new Windranger Arcana
DOTA_UpcomingRewards_TI10_CollectibleAeg: Claim your own 1/5th-scale alloy replica of the famed champion's prize.
DOTA_UpcomingRewards_TI10_CollectibleRos: Bring Baby Roshan out of his pit and into your home, and replace your in-game Roshan with a Battle Pass variant.

DOTA_TI10_UnderDraft_Description: Sithil and Quirt are hiring help to find the mythic <font color='#ffffff'>Emblem of Divinity</font>. Recruit heroes using gold earned from Battle Pass rewards and recycling. Upgrade heroes by collecting three of the same type — just like in Underlords. Then sell your hero contracts for special gems you can redeem for valuable items like <font color='#E3AD39'>Immortal Treasures</font> and <font color='#ACE45C'>Arcana</font> items.
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_BonusTreasure_Progr: {d:tickets_until_reward} MORE GEM TO SPEND TO UNLOCK#|#{d:tickets_until_reward} MORE GEMS TO SPEND TO UNLOCK
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_Rewards_Desc: Why go through all that hero-middle-management business if you can't reap the benefits of someone else's hard work? Tally up your Gems and put them to good use in this special side-of-the-side shop. As you can see, they offer a veritable host of fantastic rewards.
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_Rewards_Desc_Plus: Subscribers also get an additional <font color='#ffffff'>1 shard</font> for each Red gem spent and <font color='#ffffff'>1000 shards</font> for each Blue gem spent.
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_BonusTreasure_Uncla: Click to claim your bonus treasure!
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_DetailsReroll: Each Roll fills your Shop with these heroes
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_DescriptionReroll: Every time you reroll, all shop slots are refreshed with a random hero. These are the probabilities to get a hero of each specific tier in a slot.
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_DetailsRewards: Sell your hero to collect gems as seen below. Those gems can be redeemed for great rewards!
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_DescriptionRewards: At any time, you can dismiss any hero in your crew and collect gems. The gems collected depend on the hero's tier and stars. Dismiss 3-star heroes to maximize your gem revenue. High tier 3-star heroes will yield Keeper Gems that can be traded for even better rewards.
DOTA_Compendium_UnderDraft_HowTo1: Gather gold from your Battle Pass Rewards, your Guild Rewards, or recycling.
DOTA_Compendium_UnderDraft_HowTo2: Add heroes to your roster. Like in Underlords, three of the same hero creates a 2-star version and three 2-stars create a valuable 3-star.
DOTA_Compendium_UnderDraft_HowTo3: Sell your heroes for Gems. More expensive and higher-tier heroes give better rewards.
DOTA_Compendium_UnderDraft_HowTo4: Gems can be redeemed for a host of special rewards like Immortal Treasures and Arcana items.
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_DescriptionEmblem: Every time you reroll your heroes, you'll have a cosmically-rare chance to find a limited-run, marketable Emblem of Divinity.

DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_RollBack_Text: By pressing this button, you can replace the heroes in your current bench with the ones you had when the Sideshop was deprecated. You can only do this once. Do you want to proceed?
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_RollBack_Tooltip: You can press the roll back button to replace the heroes in your current bench with the ones you had when the Sideshop was deprecated. This action can be performed only once and is useful if you were making progress towards one or several heroes before the patch and have since sold them. If you reroll, buy or sell a hero, this option will be permanently disabled.
DOTA_TI10_Underdraft_RollBack_Question: Performing this action now will DISABLE the option to roll back your bench. You can read more about rolling back your bench by hovering over the 'Roll Back Bench' button. Are you sure you want to proceed?

DOTA_TI10_SummerEvent_Page_Desc: This summer, a mysterious power arrives to disrupt the war of the Ancients, and no one — god, mortal, or monster alike — can resist its terrifying pull. Step away from the battlefield and into a labyrinth of trials and horrors. The one to master it all... could be you.
DOTA_TI10_EventGameTeaser1_Desc: Wade into a four-player maze of madness and mayhem—exploring with friends or queue-met allies—to uncover a mystery long lost within the fog of this great war.
DOTA_TI10_EventGameTeaser2_Desc: Work as a team to choose your path. Behind every door awaits a new surprise, and no two adventures will go the same. Those who prove worthy can unlock an even greater challenge—and of course commensurate rewards.
DOTA_TI10_EventGameTeaser3_Desc: Any Dota players who want to try their hand are welcome to join the fray while this special event is active. Battle Pass owners will receive special rewards for their play.
DOTA_TooltipDescription_Title1: フレンドにバトルパスを1つプレゼントした。3つプレゼントすると、次のタイトルがアンロックされます。
DOTA_TooltipDescription_Title2: フレンドにバトルパスを3つプレゼントした。5つプレゼントすると、次のタイトルがアンロックされます。
DOTA_TooltipDescription_Title3: フレンドにバトルパスを1つプレゼントした。
DOTA_TooltipDescription_Title4: フレンドにコンペンディウムを1つプレゼントした。3つプレゼントすると、次のタイトルがアンロックされます。
DOTA_TooltipDescription_Title5: フレンドにコンペンディウムを3つプレゼントした。5つプレゼントすると、次のタイトルがアンロックされます。
DOTA_TooltipDescription_Title6: フレンドにコンペンディウムを5つプレゼントした。
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Lore: In an age lost even to his own memory, Ostarion fed his lust for eternal life not with spectral essence, but a nigh-unending harvest of bone. The walls of his palace were formed of fired bone; the streets paved with bones of every sort of creature and every enemy. And those of the flesh who entered this domain took great care, for the King was first and foremost a collector, and nothing moved in the Empire of Bone without summoning the gaze of his unblinking eyes.
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Equip: When equipped, this Arcana item set grants these custom upgrades to Wraith King:
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_MapLabel: Harvest your fallen foes after each victory.  Click here for a preview.
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_PlaySample: Click to listen to sample lines
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Feature_1_Desc: Wraith King's model and loadout pedestal have been stripped down to the bone and redesigned into a full item set to reflect the calcified glory of his former days—complete with custom Mortal Strike skeleton vassals.
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Feature_2_Desc: Features a full set of all-new animations, along with all-new effects for Wraithfire Blast, Reincarnation, and critical hits—including a special kill effect for striking down heroes with a critical hit.
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, and a minimap icon.
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Feature_4_Desc: When equipped, this Arcana item grants these custom upgrades to Wraith King:
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Feature_5_Desc: Kill 100 unique enemy heroes and collect their bones to unlock the Malignant Rule alternate style.
Debut_Arcana_Wraith_King_Feature_6_Desc: When you've been missed, the world wants to celebrate your return. Show them their jubilance is not misplaced and return the many high-fives with a new custom high-five model during the Battle Pass season.
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_MiniGame_Subtitl: オルタネイトスタイル 'Malignant Rule' をアンロックしよう
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_MiniGame_Descrip: 敵を倒して勝利し、その亡き骸を100体集めるとオルタネイトスタイル 'Malignant Rule' が解放されます。
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_PreGame_Descript: これらのヒーローを倒して試合に勝利し、Malignant Ruleスタイル開放のプログレスを進めよう。
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_GameEnd_Descript: 敵を降伏させた！Wraith Kingのアルカナ装備画面のマップで亡き骸を刈り取ろう。
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_MiniGame_Claimab: 刈り取られるのを待っている骨たち
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_MiniGame_Slideou:
{s:last_kill_hero_name}を倒した。
試合に勝利して亡き骸を刈り取ろう！

ONE TRUE KINGに殺されました。
試合に勝利しなければあなたの亡き骸が刈り取られてしまいます！
KillEaterEvent_SkeletonKing_ArcanaProgre: 種類のヒーローを倒した
Debut_SkeletonKing_Arcana_Subtitle: New Arcana Bundle for Wraith King
DOTA_Arcana_Wraith_King_PostGameProgress: クリックして彼らを倒しましょう！
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Intro: New Arcana Bundle for QUEEN OF PAIN
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Lore: Content for so long exploring the playground of the mortal realm, Akasha returns now to the dangerous Court of Ristul, where her star has fallen in her time away. But the Queen above intends to claim as well the throne below. Striking a bargain with an exiled demon prince, Akasha has seized a new measure of power, and her fiendish plans are at last set to begin.
KillEaterEventType_QueenOfPain_ArcanaPro: Heroes Tormented by Sonic Wave in Winning Games
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Feature_1_Desc: Queen of Pain's entire model, items, and loadout pedestal have been fittingly redesigned to reflect the power of true demon royalty that she has gained in her bargain.
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Feature_2_Desc: Features an all-new animation set, Sonic Wave counter, new Sonic Wave and Blink, custom deny effect, new ambient effects for both styles, and a custom whip melee attack animation and effect for those special close encounters.
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, and a Minimap Icon.
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Feature_4_Desc: Akasha has added over 500 new voice lines to her repertoire, along with new performances of all her old favorites.
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Feature_5_Desc: Indulge in the torment with all-new sound effects for Sonic Wave, Blink, and special whip melee attacks.
Debut_Arcana_QueenOfPain_Feature_6_Desc: Torment 1000 enemies with Sonic Wave in victories to unlock the Royal Decree alternate style.
Debut_Pudge_Persona_Lore: Feared most amongst the fluff-stuffed denizens of the toybox, The Toy Butcher stalks the corners and shadows of the bin, always on the hunt for his next kill. Every toy knows that once the butcher gets his hook in you, your stuffing and your life are forfeit—like as not to be left strewn about the lanes as the plushy monster jaunts happily away from your lonely, ragged remains.
Debut_Pudge_Persona_Feature_1_Desc: This Persona completely replaces the original model and character for Pudge with a fuzzy likeness just taking his first steps into the wonderful world of butchery.
Debut_Pudge_Persona_Feature_2_Desc: As much as he wishes otherwise, The Toy Butcher isn't made of meat, so he has a completely new set of animations befitting his epic fluff.
Debut_Pudge_Persona_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Topbar Portrait, Ability Icons, and Minimap Icon.
Debut_Pudge_Persona_Feature_4_Desc: The Toy Butcher has a completely new voice performance with over 800 lines of dialogue.
Debut_AM_Wei_Persona_Lore: From the ashes of a fallen faith, the time has come to witness a new lineage rise. Trained in the lost ways of the Turstarkuri by her adopted mentor the Anti-Mage, the disciple Wei has been called upon to put her years of practice to the final test. Now she must leave the confines of the temple—to cast off the horrors of the past and find out if she's truly ready to face the world of magic and bring the wizards of these realms to their vile knees.
Debut_AM_Wei_Persona_Feature_1_Desc: This Persona completely replaces the original model and character for Anti-Mage with his young disciple, Wei, who begins her own journey to rid the world of magic.
Debut_AM_Wei_Persona_Feature_2_Desc: Wei is a loyal disciple, but her journey is her own. She has a completely new set of animations to help show the more arcane-indulgent creatures of the world that their time on this plane grows short.
Debut_AM_Wei_Persona_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Topbar Portrait, and a Minimap Icon.
Debut_AM_Wei_Persona_Feature_4_Desc: Wei has a completely new voice performance with over 900 lines of dialogue.
Debut_WR_Arcana_Lore: The mysteries of her birth had always enchanted Lyralei and her adopted family. But as she grew, and her strange connection with the guardian wind became ever stronger, an unease about her origins began to take hold. And though she thought to run from it, her headlong path led only to the discovery of a difficult truth — that her village and blood kin had been destroyed by wind elementals on a night of righteous reckoning, and that such destruction was necessary to reclaim her as one of their own.
Debut_WR_Arcana_Feature_1_Desc: Windranger's entire model, items, and loadout pedestal have transformed to evoke the power of the guardian wind.
Debut_WR_Arcana_Feature_2_Desc: Features an all-new animation set, sound effects, Focus Fire damage counter, a custom-designed channel bar, new ambient wind effects for both styles, additions to base and Immortal effects for her abilities, and new death effects for both Windranger and enemy heroes she takes down.
Debut_WR_Arcana_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Topbar Portrait, and a Minimap Icon.
Debut_WR_Arcana_Feature_4_Desc: Compass of the Rising Gale adds over 500 new voice lines to Lyralei's repertoire, along with new performances of all her old favorites.
Debut_WR_Arcana_Feature_Minigame_Desc: Rack up 2,500,000 damage using Focus Fire to kill enemies and unlock the Reflections of the Gale alternate style.
DOTA_WindrunnerArcana_ArcanaProgress_Des: Deal {d:unlock_value} damage to enemies that are killed while under the effect of Focus Fire.
KillEaterEventType_Windrunner_ArcanaProg: Damage dealt to enemies killed during Focus Fire.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Lore: The many aspects of Mercurial are fragments of a single form no longer -- for one has stolen away from the many, and the realities of a new Spectre rise. Enticed and trapped by a cursed set of armor, a solitary shade of Mercurial finds that with each soul she harvests for the blighted plate, a stronger sense of self arrives along with it. While at first such forced separation enraged her, she now seeks this tantalizing freedom... Killing whomever she needs to earn more.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Equip: When equipped, this Arcana item set grants these custom upgrades to Spectre:
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_PlaySample: Click to listen to sample lines
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_1_Desc: Spectre's model and loadout pedestal have been dispersed and refocused into a full item set to reflect the emergent reality of this newly autonomous shade.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_2_Desc: Features a full set of all-new animations, attack sound, and ambient effects, along with all-new effects for Spectral Dagger, Dispersion, Desolate, and Haunt.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, and a minimap icon.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_4_Desc: Features a dual-layer voice response system. As Spectre grows stronger, her responses will become focused and easier to understand.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_5_Desc: Earn a Mega Kill streak in 100 different games to unlock the Phantom Ascension alternate style.
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_6_Title: Custom Death and Special Item Effects
Debut_Arcana_Spectre_Feature_6_Desc: Includes new custom death effects for both Spectre and the enemies that she kills, as well as a custom deny effect. She also receives new effects for Radiance and Blademail.
DOTA_Arcana_Spectre_MiniGame_Subtitle: Unlock the Phantom Ascension alternate style
DOTA_Arcana_Spectre_MiniGame_Description: Get a Mega Kill Streak in {d:target_score} game to reach the style unlock.#|#Get a Mega Kill Streak in {d:target_score} games to reach the style unlock.
DOTA_HUD_Scoreboard_SpectreArcanaNeeded: 2番目のスタイルアンロックに必要な連続キル
DOTA_ArcanaProgress_Header_generic: アルカナオルタネイトスタイル
DOTA_ArcanaProgress_Title_generic: アンロックプログレス
Debut_Davion_Lore: The knights of Dragon Hold know firsthand the suffering and hardships that await those left orphaned by dragon-strike. But only one amongst them has glimpsed the thunderous truths of the universe through the eyes of an eldwurm. Now he fights for a greater purpose than vengeance or glory... Even as he fears the loss of his human soul.
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_1_Title: All-new Models for Davion and Slyrak
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_1_Desc: Davion and Slyrak have been redesigned to match their appearances in the DOTA: Dragon's Blood anime series.
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_2_Desc: Features a full set of all-new animations for both Davion and Slyrak.
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, and minimap icons.
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_4_Desc: Featuring the voice talents of Yuri Lowenthal as Davion and Tony Todd as Slyrak, two iconic voices of DOTA: Dragon's Blood sound right at home on the battlefield.
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_5_Desc: Increase your Battle Level to unlock Davion's alternate armor without the cape, helmet with custom Dragon's Blood icon, and alternate sword.
Debut_Persona_Davion_Feature_6_Desc: Welcome your enemies to the fight in anime style with Davion's custom Dragon's Tail effect.
Debut_Marci_Desc: 永遠の忠誠心が比類なき力を生むことを証明したMarciは、仲間を守るために常に拳を振り上げる準備をして戦いに臨む。戦場で敵と味方を軽々と投げ飛ばす彼女は、どんな乱闘にも喜んで飛び込み、味方に絶大な力を与え、神々にさえも敵対する道の賢明さを考え直させるほどの隠された強力な力を解き放つことができる。
Debut_Mirana_Persona_Lore: Bound by oath and honor to serve the needs of something larger than herself, Mirana of Nightsilver ranges far from home to defend the secrets of the temple she loves. In a world of twisted enemies and complex friends, she trusts in her bond with the fearless Sagan, and in the aim of her ever-ready bow.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_1_Title: All-new Models for Mirana and Sagan
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_1_Desc: Mirana and Sagan have been redesigned to match their appearance in the DOTA: Dragon's Blood anime series.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_2_Desc: Features a full set of all-new animations for Mirana and Sagan.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, and minimap icons.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_4_Desc: Featuring the voice talents of Lara Pulver as Mirana, another iconic voice from DOTA: Dragon's Blood joins the battlefield of the Ancients.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_5_Desc: Increase your Battle Level to unlock Mirana's alternate armor from her days as a commander in Selemene's fearsome Dark Moon.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_6_Title: Custom Starfall and Sacred Arrow Effects
Debut_Persona_Mirana_Feature_6_Desc: Summon the anime style of Nightsilver with Mirana's custom Starfall and Sacred Arrow effects.
Debut_Persona_Mirana_AlternateStyle: Dark Moon Set - Unlocked at Level 235
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_VictimSelfDescript: {s:revenge_target_hero}にキルされてしまいました！キルし返して試合に勝利することで進捗を進めてもう一つのスタイルを解放しましょう！
{s:revenge_target_hero} has killed you! Kill them and win this game with your team to earn Battle Pass rewards and exact your revenge!
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_RevengeCompleteDes: {s:revenge_target_hero}へのリベンジに成功しました！試合に勝利する事でもう一つのスタイルを解放するための進捗を進めましょう。
You have exacted your revenge on {s:revenge_target_hero}, win this game with your team to earn Battle Pass rewards!
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_WeeklyEvent_Desc: The Dread Retribution event is active in this match! Participate in Revenge Kills to reap a weekly reward.
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_WeeklyEvent_Toolti: The Dread Retribution event is active for the duration of the Battle Pass.
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_HowToPlay_Desc: On your first death, your killer will be marked as your Revenge Target. If you exact revenge by killing them at least once during the match, and your team wins, you will receive an Aghanim's Helping Hand. Drow Ranger will also get bonus credit towards her style unlock for any allied Revenge Kills.
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_HowToPlay_Tooltip: Kill credit will be given as long as you deal damage to your target 2 seconds before they die.
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_RewardText: You exacted your revenge and earned an Aghanim's Helping Hand.
DOTA_DrowRangerArcana_ArcanaProgress_Des: Earn {d:unlock_value} Revenge Progress to unlock the alternate style.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Intro: Drow Rangerの新しいアルカナバンドル
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Lore: Through the eyes of the mad mask, Traxex glimpsed forgotten memories of her youth. But in addition to her own repressed terrors, the mask revealed much more — horrors glimpsed by different eyes in other times. Now, even as she casts the mask aside, she must fight to overcome the most self-destructive impulses unleashed by the evils burned behind her eyes. In this maelstrom of loathing, her only recourse is vengeance... against any worthy victims that cross her path.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Equip: When equipped, this Arcana item set grants these custom upgrades to Drow Ranger:
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_PlaySample: Click to listen to sample lines
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_1_Desc: Drow Ranger's model and pedestal have followed the dark transformation of her mind and now fit perfectly the bloody trail Traxex stalks.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_2_Desc: Features a full set of all-new animations and ambient effects, as well as all-new effects for Frost Arrow, Gust, Multishot, and Marksmanship.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_3_Desc: Includes an all-new Revenge indicator, custom channeling bar for Multishot, Hero Portrait, Ability Icons, a minimap icon, and new item icons for Hurricane Pike, Satanic, and Daedalus.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_4_Desc: Drow Ranger has an entirely new voice performance by the original actor to reflect this grim change of heart, including special responses for victims of her revenge.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_5_Title: Custom Kill and Special Item Effects
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_5_Desc: Includes a new custom kill effect for Drow's victims, a new deny effect, and new effects for Forcestaff and Lifesteal.
Debut_Arcana_DrowRanger_Feature_6_Desc: Secure Revenge Kills in different victories to unlock the Master of Madness alternate style.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti10_porta: Make no promises, tell no lies. Make lots of promises, kill anyone who calls you a liar.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti10_disco: The healing power of dance will not increase your HP regen. But that's not why we dance.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti10_hot_p: Toss a hot pepper to another hero--friend or foe. The pepper explodes after a random amount of time. Don't get caught holding it!
Get rid of that Hot Pepper before it explodes! Toss it to a friendly or enemy hero.
DOTA_Tooltip_modifier_seasonal_ti10_hot_: Don't get caught holding this explosive Hot Pepper!
You were holding the pepper. It went splat!
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti10_socce: It doesn't matter what game we're playing. I slay.
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti10_guild: Plant your guild's banner to mark this battleground for you all!
DOTA_Tooltip_ability_seasonal_ti10_high_: Throw your hand (or handy appendage) in the air!

DOTA_LaneSelectionDescription: Queue for a Ranked All Pick match as a specific role. Your team will include one Safe Lane, one Mid Lane, one Off Lane, and two Support players.
DOTA_LaneSelection_RoleCall_Desc: Improve the Dota community's matchmaking experience by playing a high-demand role and get a reward of up to 1000 Dota Plus Shards per week.
DOTA_RR_NoRoleQueue: ロールキューゲームではありません
DOTA_RR_RolePerformanceTitle: ロールキューマッチメイキング
DOTA_RR_RoleHandicapTitle: ロール別パフォーマンス
DOTA_RR_RoleHandicapExplain: ランクマッチのロールキューゲームでのあなたの過去の成績に基づいて、マッチを検索する際、各ロールのパフォーマンスを考慮して、あなたのランクを調整します。これにより、プレイスタイルやプレイするロールに関わらず、公平なマッチを見つけることができます。
DOTA_Play_RR_PartyQPEmpty: パーティーのだれかのロールキューがありません。ロールキューの対象となるすべてのロールを選択してください。
DOTA_Play_RR_PartyGainingQP: あなたのパーティーは5つすべてのロールを選択しています。各プレイヤ―はロールキューを稼ぐことが出来ます。
DOTA_Play_RR_SoloEarningQP:p{earn_amount: {d:earn_amount}ロールキュー稼ぐことができます(敗けた場合は半分)。
DOTA_Play_RR_PartyEarningQP:p{earn_amoun: 各パーティーメンバーは{d:earn_amount}ロールキュー獲得できます(敗けた場合は半分)。
DOTA_Play_RR_FiveStack: フルパーティーは常にランクロールの対象となります。
DOTA_Play_RR_HighDemand: 需要の高いロールがすべて選択されています。すべてのロールを選択するとロールキューを稼ぐことができます。
DOTA_Play_RR_SoloSpendingQP: ロールキューを消費します。
DOTA_Play_RR_PartySpendingQP: 各パーティーメンバーはロールキューを消費します。
DOTA_Play_RR_SoloMissingQP: 少なくとも両方のサポートを選択してください。
DOTA_Play_RR_SoloMissingQP_Tooltip: 両方のサポートを選択すると、この試合でランクロールをプレイすることができます。また、すべてのロールを選択することでどのロールでも使用できるようになるロールキューを獲得することができます。
DOTA_Play_RR_PartyMissingQP: あなたのパーティーは両方のサポートを選択しなければなりません。
DOTA_Play_RR_PartyMissingQP_Tooltip: パーティーで両方のサポートを選択すると、ランクロールでプレイすることができます。また、すべてのロールを選択することで、どのロールでも使用できるようになるロールキューを稼ぐことが出来ます。

DOTA_RR_PartyEarningQP:p{earn_amount}: すべてのロールを選択しているため、各パーティーメンバーは{d:earn_amount}ロールキューを獲得することができます。(敗けた場合は半分)
DOTA_RR_FiveStack: フルパーティーは常にランクロールに参加できますが、ロールキューは獲得できません。
DOTA_RR_SoloHighDemand: 需要の高いロールをすべて選択しています。追加のロールキューを稼ぎたい場合は、残りのロールも選択してください。
DOTA_RR_PartyHighDemand: 需要の高いロールをすべて選択しています。追加のロールキューを稼ぎたい場合は、残りのロールも選択してください。
DOTA_RR_HighDemandRole_Description: このロールは需要が高いです。パーティーで需要の高いロールをすべて選択すれば、ロールキューを消費しません。
DOTA_RR_SoloSpendingQP: ロールキューを消費して、選んだロールでプレイします。
DOTA_RR_PartySpendingQP: 各パーティーメンバーはロールキューを消費して、選んだロールでプレイします。
DOTA_RR_GamesRemaining_None_Party: パーティーのだれかがロールキューを持っていません
DOTA_RR_GamesRemaining_None: ロールキューがありません
DOTA_RR_EarnGames:p{earn_amount}: {d:earn_amount}ロールキュー稼げます(敗けた場合は半分)
DOTA_RR_Reason: すべてのロールを選択した状態でマッチを検索すると、より良い試合を迅速にマッチングすることができます。MMRが高いイモータルの試合では、ロールキューは無効となります。
DOTACavernCrawl_ZoomRegion: エリアをクリックしてズーム

DOTACavernCrawl_LegendCaveIn_Desc: Cave-ins block travel and cannot be cleared.
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendLockedDoor_Desc: Locked Doors block travel but can be unlocked with Keys.
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendKey_Desc: Keys are used to open Locked Doors.
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendFlare_Desc: ロケットフレアは探索していない地点を偵察できます。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendWand_Desc: ネザースワップの杖は指定したヒーローをランダムな別のヒーローと交換します。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendStyle_Desc: Unlocks a style on the final reward set.
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendUltraRare_Desc: Grants the ultra rare <font color='#88FCBD'>Jade Baby Roshan!</font>
DOTACavernCrawl_Description: 指示されたヒーローで試合に勝利することで、宝物が散らばるランダム生成される洞窟を探索することができます。試合勝利後にエリアを探索して宝物を集め、新しい通路のヒーローを確認しましょう。さらに奥に進むと、最大で3つの限定アイテムセットを獲得することができます。部屋の宝物には、セットのスタイルの欠片、バトルポイント、旅を助けるお助けアイテムなどが含まれています。
DOTACavernCrawl_ClaimInstructions: クリックして報酬を受け取る
DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_LockedDoor: Locked Door - Use Key To Unlock
DOTACavernCrawl_RewardName_SupportStyleU: Vigil of the Penitent Scholar Style Unlock
DOTACavernCrawl_RewardName_SupportFinalT: Vigil of the Penitent Scholar Set
DOTACavernCrawl_InventoryInstructions: クリックでアイテムを選択し、地点や通路を指定すると、そのアイテムを使用することが出来ます。
DOTACavernCrawl_PregameDesc: Win with heroes that have {g:dota_cavern_name_short:cavern_event_id} icons to earn rewards.
DOTACavernCrawl_FailedToLoad: {g:dota_cavern_name:cavern_event_id} データのロードに失敗しました。再度お試しください。
DOTACavernCrawl_DescLine1: Win games with heroes marked with the {g:dota_cavern_name:cavern_event_id} icon to win rewards.
DOTACavernCrawl_DescLine2: Click 'View Map' to view the current state of your {g:dota_cavern_name:cavern_event_id}.
DOTACavernCrawl_DescLine3: Use this filter to see only heroes which are active {g:dota_cavern_name:cavern_event_id} heroes.

DOTACavernCrawl_LegendUltraRare_Desc_TI2: Grants the ultra rare <font color='#88FCBD'>Jade Baby Roshan!</font>
DOTACavernCrawl_Description_TI2019: Venture through these hidden jungle ruins on a quest to uncover its secrets. Heroes that block your progress must be defeated by winning a game with them in order to clear a pathway to discovering bonus Battle Points, Plus Shards, and exclusive item sets.
DOTACavernCrawl_Description_Turbo: 注意:ターボゲームでヒーローを倒すには2回勝利する必要があります。1回目の勝利でヒーローに傷ついたヒーローはアイテムのカリングブレードを使うことで倒すことができます。
DOTACavernCrawl_Reward_Label_TI2019: ウルトラレア リワード
DOTACavernCrawl_Reward_Title_TI2019: Try for your chance to discover one of only 200 Ultra-Rare Couriers
DOTACavernCrawl_Reward_Desc_TI2019: The baby Roshans have hidden themselves deep within the jungle, clear spaces to see if you're a lucky winner.
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step1_Title: ヒーローを倒して、報酬を見つけよう
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step1_Desc: マップに表示されたヒーローで勝利してエリアをクリアし、お宝を集めて、勇敢な旅を続けましょう。
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step2_Title: アイテムを探して、道を切り開け
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step2_Desc: 森の中には便利なアイテムがたくさん隠れています。 それらを使って、通れない道を切り開いていきましょう。
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step3_Title: 限定アイテムセットを解放しよう
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step3_Desc: {g:dota_cavern_name:cavern_event_id}のマップの各区域に隠されているスタイルの欠片を集めると、その区域の報酬セットの別スタイルがアンロックされます。

DOTACavernCrawl_Description_TI2020: Explore Nightsilver -- where the goddess Selemene reigns -- as you quest to uncover its secrets. Defeat heroes that block your progress by winning a game as them, clearing a pathway to bonus Battle Points, Plus Shards, and exclusive item sets. Find three key fragments to unlock and explore a second map, the hidden dimension of Foulfell.
DOTACavernCrawl_Tutorial_Step2_Desc_TI20: Each section of the Nightsilver map contains a hidden Foulfell Map key fragment. Find all three to unlock a second map with additional rewards and style unlocks!
DOTACavernCrawl_Description_Spring2021: マッドムーンから隕石の雨が霧の森トモカンに降り注ぎ、トレジャーハンターたちを暗い森の奥へと誘います。行く手を阻むヒーローで試合に勝利する事で、バトルポイントやシャード、限定アイテムセットへの道が開けます。
DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_LockedDoor_Sprin: 裂け目 - グラップリングフックで横断可能
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendLockedDoor_Desc_Sp: 裂け目はグラップリングフックでのみ横断可能です。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendKey_Title_Spring20: グラップリングフック
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendKey_Desc_Spring202: グラップリングフックを使うと裂け目を横断できます。
DOTACavernCrawl_RewardName_Key_Spring202: グラップリングフック
DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_CaveIn_Spring202: Nemesticeの隕石 - ウォーデンの羅針盤で横断可能
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendCaveIn_Desc_Spring: 月の残骸で塞がれたこの道は、ウォーデンの羅針盤がなければ安全に通れません。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendShovel_Desc_Spring: ウォーデンの羅針盤を使うと隕石で破壊された道を通ることが出来ます。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendSmallTreasure_Desc: 中には250 バトルポイントと125 Dota Plusシャードが入っています。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendLargeTreasure_Desc: 中には2000 バトルポイントと1000 Dota Plusシャードが入っています。
DOTACavernCrawl_RewardName_SmallTreasure: 250 バトルポイントと125 Dota Plusシャード
DOTACavernCrawl_RewardName_LargeTreasure: 2000 バトルポイントと1000 Dota Plusシャード
DOTACavernCrawl_Description_Fall2021: Aghanimのコンティニュアムデバイスを使った実験により、未知の現実が開かれ、そこでは危険を冒して冒険する者たちに富が待っています。ゲームに勝つと、バトルポイントやプラスシャード、限定アイテムへの道が開かれます。
DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_LockedDoor_Fall2: 巨石 - ピッケルで破壊可能
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendLockedDoor_Desc_Fa: 巨石は道を塞いでいますが、ピッケルで破壊可能です。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendKey_Desc_Fall2021: ピッケルは巨石を破壊出来ます。
DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_Key_Fall2021: ピッケルを巨石に使うと破壊できます。
DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_CaveIn_Fall2021: 罠の道 - コンティニュアムのお守りで通過可能
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendCaveIn_Desc_Fall20: コンティニュアムにより移り変わる現実は、危険な罠に満ちている。お守りを見つけて、この恐ろしい道を切り開きましょう。
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendShovel_Title_Fall2: コンティニュアムのお守り
DOTACavernCrawl_LegendShovel_Desc_Fall20: 不思議な装飾品が危険な罠から守ってくれます。

DOTACavernCrawl_Tooltip_Shovel_Fall2021: お守りを使うと罠を通り抜けることができます。

Place a bounty on another player!

If a teammate kills your bounty target while the bounty is active, they'll earn {d:bounty_battle_points} Battle Points and one of your Bounty Tokens will be consumed.

If no one fulfills the bounty in time, your Token won't be spent.

DOTA_Tipping_About_Line1: Access the in-game scoreboard to tip players in your matches whenever they do something worthy of recognition.
DOTA_Tipping_About_Line2: Each tip is worth 25 Battle Points at the start. You can upgrade your tips along the Battle Pass rewards path to give 50, 100, or 200 Battle Points.
DOTA_Tipping_About_Line3: Each Battle Pass owner can give ten tips per week, with a maximum of three per match.
DOTA_Tipping_About_Line4: Tipping does not cost your own Battle Points, so try to spend all ten each week.

DOTA_Frostivus2018_Dates_Tooltip:
Frosthaven consumables are usable while the event is active, December 19, 2018 through January 7, 2019.

Cosmetic consumables and Chat Wheel rewards are usable until February 1, 2019.
DOTA_Frostivus2018_Lore: Swept up in the zeal of unraveling and reshaping arcane energies, the Grand Magus marches a mob into Frosthaven, intent on uprooting the original Frostivus tree to explore the mysterious font of power beneath it. To stop the misguided magus, five heroes must rise to the defense of the ancient tree—and fight to keep the Spirit of Frostivus alive!
DOTA_Frostivus2018_ConsumableDescription:
Frosthaven Supplies are consumable items that can be used at strategic moments to turn the tide of battle.

Frosthaven supplies will sometimes drop as gifts during Frosthaven matches. Dota Plus subscribers can also purchase extra supplies using Shards.

Your rewards also include cosmetic versions of each Frosthaven consumable to use in your normal games of Dota.
DOTA_Frostivus2018_RewardsDescription:
Each match of Frosthaven earns points based on how many rounds of enemies you defeat. Every 1000 Frosthaven points earns you one reward level, which can be used to claim items along the reward line.

Each day, your first match of Frosthaven that completes round 5 will activate a daily bonus of 1000 Frosthaven points, and grant 8x the normal points for that game.
DOTA_Frostivus2018_Store_Description: Each consumable pack contains the following:
DOTA_Frostivus2018_Store_FrosthavenDescr:
Powerful strategic abilities to defeat Rubick's dastardly waves.
Usable in the Frosthaven game mode.
DOTA_Frostivus2018_Store_CosmeticsDescri:
Spread the joy of the season with these cosmetic abilities.
Usable in normal Dota matchmaking.
DOTA_Frostivus2018_Store_FrosthavenExpir: Usable while the event is active, December 19 - January 7.
Frosthaven_EventHome_RoshReward: Claim spins on the reward wheel for a chance at the indescribably rare Gingerbread Baby Roshan.
